Container.name: MiscTT
Container.situation: extra lines from the marshal to the competitor (same as firing drills range officer)

Container.name: Warn_Has_Leader
Container.situation: adams tells the player to return

Key.Original: You're not going to find anything of interest way out there, Sergeant.
Key.Chinese: 你不會在那裡找到你感興趣的東西，中士。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你不会在那里找到你感兴趣的东西的，中士。

Key.Original: NATO peacekeepers returning to Kavala discover that the situation has gone from bad to worse.
Key.Chinese: NATO維和部隊返回到卡瓦拉，但是發現到狀況只變得更糟而已。
Key.Chinesesimp: 北约维和部队回到卡瓦拉，但是发现状况只是变得更糟而已。

Key.Original: Just under an hour ago, NATO troops were forced to engage members of the FIA in the vicinity of %1Kavirida%2. It has become clear that they were responsible for the attack on the convoy.%3Their motive is now apparent - the situation at %4the MoD%5 rapidly deteriorated, succeeded by the FIA conducting an all-out assault on %6Kavala%7. Details are still coming in, but we are certain that the FIA's actions are a direct consequence of these events. It appears to have convinced the FIA that the sit-down at %8the MoD%9 had not been conducted in good faith.%10The investigation is still ongoing.
Key.Chinese: 就在一小時前，NATO部隊被迫與FIA在%1Kavirida%2附近交戰。現在狀況就清楚了，他們得為車隊的事情負責。%3他們的舉動導致在%4國防部%5的會談迅速的惡化，現在FIA開始對%6Kavala%7發動全面的突擊了。細部的情報仍在彙整中，但有一件事是很清楚的，那就是這些事都是FIA做的。FIA很明顯就沒有誠意好好的坐下來會談。%10調查仍在持續當中。
Key.Chinesesimp: 就在一小时前，北约部队被迫与自由阵线在%1卡维里达%2附近交战。现在已经清楚他们得为车队的事情负责。%3他们的举动导致在%4国防部%5的会谈迅速恶化，紧接着自由阵线对%6卡瓦拉%7发动了孤注一掷的突击。现在仍然在不断接到新的情报细节，但有一件事是很清楚的，那就是这些事都是自由阵线做的。自由阵线很明显就没有好好的坐下来会谈的诚意。%10调查仍在持续当中。

Key.Original:
Alpha 1-2 - Your callsign.
Alpha 1-1 - Staff Sergeant Adams.
Bravo 2-3 - Inbound reinforcements.
Broadway - Colonel MacKinnon.
Phalanx - AAF Command.
Key.Chinese:
Alpha1-2-你的呼號。
Alpha1-1-上士Adams。
Bravo2-3-增援的援軍。
Broadway-上校MacKinnon。
Phalanx-AAF指揮官。
Key.Chinesesimp:
阿尔法1-2-你的呼号。
阿尔法1-1-亚当斯上士。
布拉沃2-3-增援的援军。
百老汇-麦金农上校。
密集阵-阿尔蒂斯武装力量指挥官。

Key.Original: Once %1the reinforcements%2 arrive, return to %3Kavala%4 and report in with Broadway.
Key.Chinese: 當%1援軍%2抵達後，請返回到%3Kavala%4並向Broadway進行報告。
Key.Chinesesimp: 当%1援军%2抵达后，请返回到%3卡瓦拉%4并向“百老汇”进行报告。

Key.Original:
1. Await the reinforcements.
2. Report in with Broadway.
Key.Chinesesimp:
1。等待援军。
2。向“百老汇”进行报告。

Key.Original: The following months would see a rapid deterioration in AAF-NATO relations.
Key.Chinese: 在接下來的幾個月中，AAF與NATO的關係逐漸惡化。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在接下来的几个月中，阿尔蒂斯武装力量与北约的关系逐渐恶化。

Container.name: d10_Ending
Container.situation: lacey and adams walk off

Key.Original: Come on. Let's get out of here.
Can't believe MacKinnon just shut us down like that.
Key.Chinese: 我不敢相信?金?竟然要我們退下。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我不敢相信麦金农竟然要我们退下。

Container.name: d05_Results
Container.situation: lacey and adams talk about what happened

Key.Original: Just the Chain of Command at its finest.
Callsign 'Phalanx'. Colonel Akhanteros. You just bashed horns with the AAF's top brass.
Key.Chinese: 呼號“方陣”。阿坎特?斯上校。你剛剛頂撞了AAF的高層。
Key.Chinesesimp: 呼号“密集阵”。阿坎特罗斯上校。你刚刚顶撞了阿尔蒂斯武装力量的最高层。

Key.Original: That's their top brass? Now I know why they're so fucked up.
Key.Chinese: 他是他們的高層?現在我總算知道他們為啥總是那麼混帳了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他是他们的高层?我算知道为什么他们总是那么混帐了。

Container.name: d01_Hate
Container.situation: lacey is getting frustrated

Key.Original: Hearts and minds, Sergeant. Hearts and minds...
Just so you fucking know, I'm about to shoot something.
Key.Chinese: 真是他媽的受夠了，我想要射點東西。
Key.Chinesesimp: 真是他妈的受够了，我真想朝谁开几枪。

Container.name: 45_Aftermath
Container.participants: BOOT B Lacey;BOOT I Soldier A;BOOT I HQ;BOOT B HQ;
Container.situation: player comes upon the scene at the mod

Key.Chinesesimp: 1-2，这是“百老汇”。接收中。请讲，完毕。

Key.Original: Hey, asshole, I'm talking to you!
Buddy, I'm warning you, you pick this fight and you'll lose.
Key.Chinese: 老兄，我警告你，如果你想跟我鬥的話，你會輸的很慘。
Key.Chinesesimp: 老兄，我警告你，如果你想跟我斗的话，你会输的很惨。

Key.Original: Negative, 1-2, you are to stand down. That's an order. Confirm, over.
Key.Chinese: 否定，1-2，你必須退下。這是命令。請確認，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不能，1-2，你必须退下。这是命令。请确认，完毕。

Key.Original: What's the problem? Your men are abusing these prisoners.
Key.Chinese: 搞什麼鬼?你的人正在凌虐這些囚犯。
Key.Chinesesimp: 有什么事情?你的人正在凌虐这些俘虏。

Key.Original: Is there a problem here, Sergeant?
The hell it is! Corporal, arrest them.
This is none of your business, American.
Key.Chinese: 這不關你們的事，美國佬。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这不关你们的事，美国佬。
“百老汇”，这里是“阿尔法”1-2领队。有信息。完毕。

Key.Original: What my men do is my concern, and mine alone, Sergeant.
Key.Chinese: 我的人在做的事情由我來考慮，也只有我能考慮，中士。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我的人在做的事情由我来决定，也只有我能决定，中士。

Key.Original: I've got Greenbacks abusing FIA prisoners at the MoD, sir. Please advise, over.
Key.Chinese: 我這裡發現綠軍正在國防部凌虐FIA的囚犯，長官。請指示，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我发现绿军正在国防部虐待自由阵线的囚犯，长官。请指示，完毕。

Key.Original: Don't you take another step. You are out of line, American.
Key.Chinese: 你再試試越界看看。這不關你的事，美國佬。
Key.Chinesesimp: 别得寸进尺。这不关你的事，美国佬。

Key.Original: It was a pleasure doing business with you, Sergeant.

Container.name: 40_Orders
Container.situation: adams tells the player to investigate the situation

Key.Original: Go see what's going on. I'll be there in a sec.
Key.Chinese: 你去那邊看看怎樣了。我會待在這邊幾秒鐘。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你去那边看看怎样了。我马上就到。

Container.name: 35_Mess
Container.situation: lacey reacts to the destruction

Container.name: 30_In_Truck
Container.situation: adams and player are in the truck

Container.name: 25_Truck
Container.participants: BOOT B Adams;BOOT B Soldier A;
Container.situation: adams spots the truck

Key.Chinese: 那應該就是我們的車了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 那应该就是我们的车了。

Key.Original: Martinez, McKendrick, stay behind. Keep an eye on things. The Sergeant and I will check out the MoD.
Key.Chinese: 馬丁內斯，麥肯德里克，留在這邊。保持警戒。我跟中士將前往國防部那邊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 马丁内斯，麦肯德里克，留在这儿。保持警戒。我跟中士去国防部看看。

Container.name: 20_Fire
Container.situation: adams spots the fire at the mod in kavala

Key.Original: Broadway, Alpha 1-1 Actual. What's the situation in Kavala? Over.
Key.Chinese: Broadway，這裡是Alpha1-1隊長。現在卡瓦拉的情況如何?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: “百老汇”，这里是“阿尔法”1-1领队。现在卡瓦拉的情况如何?完毕。

Key.Original: Copy. Interrogative, what do you need us for? Over.
Key.Chinese: 收到。我有疑問，你需要我們為你做什麼?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到。我有疑问，你需要我们做什么?完毕。

Key.Original: Solid copy, sir. We'll keep you updated. 1-1 out.
Key.Chinese: 完整收到，長官。我們會向你報告的。1-1通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 完整收到，长官。我们会向你报告的。1-1通话完毕。

Key.Original: Details are still coming in, but intel suggests the sitdown went haywire.
Key.Chinese: 細節仍在彙整中，但能確定會談已經談不成了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 还在不断有新的细节情报，但能确定会谈已经谈不成了。

Key.Original: Phalanx is reporting that the FIA threw themselves at the cordon.
Key.Chinesesimp: “密集阵”报告称自由阵线想要狗急跳墙。

Key.Original: I want you to take control of the situation at the MoD.
Key.Chinese: 我要你們去國防部那邊了解狀況。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我要你们去国防部那边了解状况。

Key.Original: We're getting conflicting reports left and right. I need someone on the ground. How copy?
Key.Chinese: 我快被相互矛盾的情報給煩死了。我需要有人在??。有收到嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 我手里尽是各种相互矛盾的情报。我需要有人在现场。懂吗?

Container.name: 15_Checkpoint
Container.situation: helicopter flies over the battle at the checkpoint

Container.name: 10_CSAT
Container.participants: BOOT B Soldier A;BOOT B Soldier B;
Container.situation: a wild csat helicopter appears

Key.Chinesesimp: 广协同盟在这里干什么?

Key.Original: Just marking their territory, as per usual.
Key.Chinese: 就跟往常一樣，在這裡巡視他們的領土。
Key.Chinesesimp: 就跟往常一样，在这里巡视他们的地盘。

Key.Original: Get yourselves back to Kavala. Shit's kicked off over there.
Key.Chinese: 你們趕快回到Kavala吧。那裡已經是一團糟了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你们赶回卡瓦拉吧。那里已经是一团糟了。

Container.name: 05_Situation
Container.participants: BOOT B Soldier B;BOOT B Adams;
Container.situation: reinforcements ask for an update

Key.Original: Multiple KIA. AAF and FIA. The survivor didn't make it.
Key.Chinese: 多名傷亡。AAF和FIA。而倖存者也沒撐過去。
Key.Chinesesimp: 多人阵亡。阿尔蒂斯武装力量和自由阵线都有。而幸存者也没撑下来。

Key.Original: By Christmas of 2034, NATO's peacekeeping mandate would be limited to Stratis, a small island south of the Altis mainland.
Key.Chinese: 到了2034的聖誕節時，NATO維和部隊的行動範圍被限制在Stratis，一個在Altis主島南方的小島。
Key.Chinesesimp: 到2034的圣诞节时，北约维和部队的行动范围已被限制在斯特拉蒂斯，一个在阿尔蒂斯主岛南方的小岛。

Key.Original: With conflict brewing in the Pacific, the world - and NATO itself - slowly started to forget about the tiny island republic.
Key.Chinese: 隨著太平洋的局勢不斷升溫，全世界-甚至是NATO自己-都漸漸的淡忘掉這個小島國。
Key.Chinesesimp: 随着太平洋的局势不断升温，全世界-甚至包括北约自身-都渐渐的淡忘掉这个小岛国。

Container.name: 01_Start
Container.situation: reinforcements approaching

Key.Original: The AAF and the FIA agree to a dialogue in the former capital, Kavala.
Key.Chinese: AAF與FIA同意在前首都Kavala進行對話。
Key.Chinesesimp: 阿尔蒂斯武装力量与自由阵线同意在前首都卡瓦拉进行对话。

Key.Original: The convoy was secured, but little remains. Although you broke the Rules of Engagement, it was clear that the FIA had hostile intentions. Let's keep your slip up to ourselves.
Key.Chinese: 車隊已經肅清完成了。儘管你打破了交戰守則，但很明顯的FIA在當時是我們的敵人。讓我們把自己的神?給繃緊點。
Key.Chinesesimp: 车队已经安全了，但也已经不剩什么了。尽管你打破了交战守则，但很明显的自由阵线在当时是我们的敌人。让我们把自己的神经给绷紧点。

Key.Original: The convoy was secured, but little remains. NATO peacekeeping forces were forced to engage the FIA responsible for its demise.
Key.Chinese: 車隊已經肅清完成了。NATO維和部隊被迫與FIA展開交戰。
Key.Chinesesimp: 车队已经安全了，但也已经不剩什么了。北约维和部队被迫与自由阵线展开交战。

Key.Original: Last week, an AAF patrol responded with lethal force to aggression from locals %1north of Kore%2, reportedly in self-defense. One casualty survived but later succumbed to their wounds, bringing the official death toll to 6.%3Peacekeeping forces on scene confirmed the reported timeline, but the justification for the patrol's use of force remains questionable.%4Following the incident, the government reached out to the FIA for a sit-down %5in Kavala%6, as a gesture of goodwill. As such, security has been ramped up, with peacekeeping forces watching over the proceedings.%7However, %8an AAF security convoy%9 en route from %10the AAC airfield%11 failed to pass %12an AAF checkpoint%13 east of %14Kavala%15 at its scheduled arrival time, nearly 20 minutes ago, raising fears that the situation is likely to escalate. It has failed to respond to hails from AAF Command.
Key.Chinese: 在上週，一支AAF巡邏隊侵入了%1Kore北邊%2的小鎮，並對當地人使用致命武力，後來聲稱是自衛之舉。本來有一個倖存者，但最後他也傷重不治了，讓死亡人數攀升到了六人。%3儘管維和部隊在第一時間趕到了現場，並證實了以上的回報，但巡邏隊使用武力的正當性仍然備受懷疑。%4事件過後，政府希望與FIA在%5Kavala%6坐下來好好談談，當作一種善意的舉動。因為這樣，這附近的安保等級直線往上升，而在整個過程中，維和部隊也會在旁邊觀看。%7然而現在，%8一支AAF的安保車隊%9本該從%10Altis空中俱樂部機場%11前往這裡，並經過%14Kavala%15東方的%12AAF檢查哨%13，但他們已經遲到了近20分鐘，大家擔心緊張的局勢會在升級。我們必須在關係破裂前找出車隊的行蹤。
Key.Chinesesimp: 上周，一支阿尔蒂斯武装力量巡逻队侵入了%1科雷北边%2的小镇，并对当地人使用致命武器，后来声称是自卫之举。本来有一个幸存者，但最后他也伤重不治了，让死亡人数攀升到了六人。%3尽管维和部队在第一时间赶到了现场，并证实了以上的回报，但巡逻队使用武力的正当性仍然备受怀疑。%4事件过后，政府希望与自由阵线在%5卡瓦拉%6坐下来好好谈谈，作为释放善意的举动。因此，附近的安保等级直线上升，而在整个过程中，维和部队也会在旁边监督。%7然而现在，%8一支阿尔蒂斯武装力量的安保车队%9本该从%10阿尔蒂斯空中俱乐部机场%11前往这里，并经过%14卡瓦拉%15东方的%12阿尔蒂斯武装力量检查哨%13，但他们已经迟到了近20分钟，大家担心紧张的局势会再升级。我们必须在关系破裂前找出车队的行踪。

Key.Original:
Alpha 1-2 - Your callsign.
Alpha 1-1 - Staff Sergeant Adams.
Broadway - Colonel MacKinnon.
Phalanx - AAF Command.
Key.Chinesesimp:
阿尔法1-2-你的呼号。
阿尔法1-1-亚当斯上士。
百老汇-麦金农上校。
密集阵-阿尔蒂斯武装力量指挥官。

Key.Original: <marker name = 'BIS_adams'>Alpha 1-1</marker> and <marker name = 'BIS_lacey'>1-2</marker>, led by Staff Sergeant Adams, are to deploy to <marker name = 'BIS_lost'>the convoy's last known location</marker> and, if possible, obtain a visual on the convoy itself, before reporting back to Broadway.
Key.Chinese: 由<markername='BIS_adams'>Alpha1-1</marker>和<markername='BIS_lacey'>1-2</marker>所組成的小隊，將由上士Adams帶領，將被佈署到<markername='BIS_lost'>車隊最後的已知位置</marker>，如果可以的話，請先目視到車隊，再向Broadway回報。
Key.Chinesesimp: 由<markername='BIS_adams'>阿尔法1-1</marker>和<markername='BIS_lacey'>1-2</marker>所组成的小队由上士亚当斯带领，将被布署到<markername='BIS_lost'>车队最后的已知位置</marker>，如果可以的话，请先目视到车队，再向“百老汇”回报。

Key.Original:
1. Move to the last known position.
2. Locate the convoy.
3. Report to Broadway.
Key.Chinese:
1。移動到最後的已知位置。
2。尋找車隊。
3。向Broadway回報。
Key.Chinesesimp:
1。移动到最后的已知位置。
2。寻找车队。
3。向“百老汇”回报。

Key.Original: Use your First Aid Kit on the wounded AAF soldier.
Key.Chinese: 使用你的急救箱，對AAF的傷兵進行醫療。
Key.Chinesesimp: 使用你的急救包，对阿尔蒂斯武装力量的伤兵进行医治。

Key.Original: Take Adams' First Aid Kit if you need it.
Key.Chinese: 假如你有需要的話，請拿取Adams的急救箱。
Key.Chinesesimp: 假如你有需要的话，请拿取亚当斯的急救包。

Key.Original: Secure %1the convoy's position%2 in preparation for incoming friendly reinforcements.
Key.Chinese: 為即將到來的友軍肅清%1車隊的周遭%2。
Key.Chinesesimp: 为即将到来的友军援军肃清%1车队位置%2。

Key.Original: Follow the Rules of Engagement - do not fire unless fired upon.
Key.Chinese: 遵守交戰守則-不要開火，除非對方先開火。
Key.Chinesesimp: 遵守交战守则-不开第一枪。

Key.Original: Search %1the convoy's last known position%2 for any signs of the convoy itself.
Key.Chinese: 搜尋%1車隊最後的已知位置%2，尋找任何有關車隊的跡象。
Key.Chinesesimp: 搜寻%1车队最后的已知位置%2，寻找任何有关车队的迹象。

Container.name: x10_Status_Treated
Container.situation: player already treated the wounded aaf

Key.Original: We've got wounded at the convoy. One Greenback, unresponsive, possibly in shock. It doesn't look good, but 1-2 Actual's got him stabilized. Over.
Key.Chinese: 我們在車隊這邊找到一名傷兵。一位綠軍，已經沒有反應，可能已經休克了。狀況並不太妙，但1-2隊長已經先為他做一些簡單的處理了。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们在车队这边找到一名伤兵。一位绿军，已经没有反应，可能已经休克了。状况并不太妙，但1-2领队已经先为他做了一些简单的处理。完毕。

Container.name: x05_Wounded_Player
Container.situation: player finds the wounded aaf

Container.name: x01_Ignored_ROE
Container.situation: player disobeyed the rules of engagement

Key.Original: What the fuck, Conway? Everyone, open up!
Key.Chinesesimp: 搞什么鬼，康维?所有人，开火!

Container.name: d01_Situation
Container.situation: talking about the situation

Key.Original: Who can blame him? He's the one that always has to do the cleaning up around here.
Key.Chinese: 誰能怪他呢?他總是在這邊擔當清理善後的工作。
Key.Chinesesimp: 谁能怪他呢?他总是在这边担任清理善后的工作。

Key.Original: The AAF and FIA consenting to a sit-down within the country's Ministry of Defense.
Key.Chinese: AAF與FIA都同意在國防部內坐下來好好談談。
Key.Chinesesimp: 阿尔蒂斯武装力量与自由阵线都同意在国防部内坐下来好好谈谈。

Key.Original: MacKinnon didn't seem to be too happy.
Key.Chinesesimp: 麦金农看来不怎么开心。

Key.Original: I don't know who thought that was a good idea...
Key.Chinese: 我不知道是誰認為這是個好主意...
Key.Chinesesimp: 我想不出谁能觉得这是个好主意...

Container.name: 95_Check_Up
Container.situation: adams checks on wounded aaf

Key.Chinesesimp: 孩子，你听得到我说话吗?

Container.name: 90_Wounded_Leader
Container.situation: adams spots the wounded aaf

Container.name: 85_All_Clear
Container.participants: BOOT B Adams;BOOT B Lacey;BOOT B HQ;
Container.situation: team defeats fia

Key.Original: Broadway, 1-1. Be advised, we've made contact with FIA forces at the convoy's location. All contacts neutralized. Over.
Key.Chinese: Broadway，1-1。請注意，我們已經與一小支FIA的部隊在車隊附近交火。所有敵人皆已殲滅。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: “百老汇”，1-1呼叫。请注意，我们已经与一小支自由阵线部队在车队附近交火。所有敌人都已歼灭。完毕。

Key.Original: Copy, 1-1. Lock it down. Broadway out.
Key.Chinese: 收到，1-1。封鎖那邊。Broadway通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，1-1。封锁那边。“百老汇”通话完毕。

Container.name: 80_Wave_2
Container.situation: team spots the approaching fia reinforcements

Container.name: 70_Move_Up
Container.situation: adams keeps his team organized

Key.Original: Move up! Stick to cover! Watch the trees!
Key.Chinese: 前進!尋找掩體!看好樹林的方向!
Key.Chinesesimp: 前进!寻找掩体!看好树林的方向!

Container.name: 65_Regroup
Container.situation: adams orders the team to regroup

Container.name: 60_Engage
Container.situation: adams orders the team to engage after being fired at

Container.name: 55_Covering
Container.participants: BOOT B Adams;BOOT B Soldier A;
Container.situation: adams checks with the rest of the team

Key.Original: Please tell me you two have this.
Key.Chinese: 請告訴我你們有看到他了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 请告诉我你们看到这个了。

Container.name: 50_Friendly
Container.situation: adams attempts to dissuade hostile fia

Container.name: 45_Spotted
Container.situation: adams spots the fia

Container.name: 40_Continue
Container.situation: adams and player move up

Container.name: 35_Overwatch
Container.participants: BOOT B Soldier A;BOOT B Adams;
Container.situation: rest of the team reports in

Key.Original: Understood. Maintain overwatch. We're moving up.
Key.Chinese: 了解。請繼續監視。我們要進去了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解。请继续监视。我们要进去了。

Key.Original: Convoy's been hit hard. No movement as far as I can tell.
Key.Chinese: 車隊被打的很慘。在我視力所及之處沒有任何動靜。
Key.Chinesesimp: 车队被打的很惨。我目前没看到有任何动静。

Key.Original: But, to be honest, there are a lot of trees. Over.
Key.Chinese: 但是老實說，那裡有太多的樹木遮擋住我們的視線了。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 但是老实说，这块儿有很多树。完毕。

Container.name: 30_Waiting
Container.situation: adams and player are ready before the rest

Key.Original: Hold. Let's wait for the others.
Key.Chinese: 停住。讓我們先等待其他人。
Key.Chinesesimp: 停下。我们先等等其他人。

Container.name: 25_Orders
Container.situation: adams organizes his team on the ground

Key.Original: Martinez, McKendrick, take the hill on the right. Provide overwatch.
Key.Chinese: 馬丁內斯，麥肯德里克，你們走右邊的小山坡。為我們監視該地。
Key.Chinesesimp: 马丁内斯，麦肯德里克，你们走右边的小山坡。为我们监视该地。

Container.name: 20_Confirm
Container.situation: adams confirms orders, follows on from previous conversations

Container.name: 15_ROE
Container.situation: hq reminds adams of the roe, follows on from previous conversation

Key.Original: And, Staff Sergeant - in all likelihood - you're going to have FIA guerrillas waiting for you down there.
Key.Chinese: 還有，上士-有可能的話-你們可能會在底下遇到FIA的游擊隊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 还有，上士-很有可能-当地可能会有自由阵线游击队在等着你。

Key.Original: Stick to the ROE. Do not fire unless fired upon. However, that does not mean you are to roll over and take it. Confirm, over.
Key.Chinese: 請遵守交戰手則。不要開火，除非對方先開火。然而也並不是要你們完全執行，請自行判斷狀況。確認嗎，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 请遵守交战手则。绝不开第一枪。然而也并不是要你们傻走过去让他们白打。请确认，完毕。

Container.name: 125_Perimeter
Container.situation: adams orders his team to set up a perimeter

Key.Original: I'm not in the mood for any more surprises!
Key.Chinese: 我現在沒有心情承受另外一起驚喜!
Key.Chinesesimp: 我现在没有心情承受另外一起惊喜!

Container.name: 120_Treated
Container.situation: player treated the wounded aaf

Key.Original: He's holding, but not for long. We need medical here now.
Key.Chinese: 他已經止血了，但撐不了多久。我們這裡需要醫療支援。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他已经止血了，但撑不了多久。我们这里需要医疗支援。

Container.name: 115_Medical
Container.situation: hq tells them medical is inbound

Key.Chinese: 我們會嘗試看看，Broadway。1-1通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们会尝试看看，“百老汇”。1-1通话完毕。

Key.Original: Copy. Relaying to Phalanx. Medical is inbound with reinforcements. Try to keep him stable until they arrive. Over.
Key.Chinese: 收到。我將轉發給Phalanx。醫療支援會跟援軍一起抵達。在他們抵達之前，試著讓他穩定下來。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到。我将转发给“密集阵”。医疗支援会跟援军一起抵达。在他们抵达之前，试着让他稳定下来。完毕。

Container.name: 110_Treating
Container.situation: player is in the process of treating the aaf

Key.Original: We've got wounded at the convoy. One Greenback, unresponsive, possibly in shock. It doesn't look good, but 1-2 Actual's taking care of him. Over.
Key.Chinese: 我們有一名車隊的傷兵。一位綠軍，反應遲鈍，可能已經休克了。狀況不太妙，但1-2隊長已經在為他做緊急處理了。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们有一名车队的伤兵。一名绿军，没有反应，可能已经休克了。状况不太妙，但1-2领队已经在为他做紧急处理了。完毕。

Container.name: 10_Convoy_Found
Container.situation: adams spots the convoy

Key.Original: Broadway, Alpha 1-1 Actual. We have a visual on the convoy. Grid 073-123. How copy? Over.
Key.Chinese: Broadway，這裡是Alpha1-1隊長。我們已經目視到車隊了。座標在073-123。有收到嗎?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: “百老汇”，这里是“阿尔法”1-1队长。我们已经目视到车队了。座标在073-123。有收到吗?完毕。

Key.Original: 1-1 Actual, Broadway. Copy. Dispatching reinforcements. Secure the area and await their arrival.
Key.Chinese: 1-1隊長，Broadway。收到。已派遣援軍過去。肅清該區並等待他們的抵達。
Key.Chinesesimp: 1-1队长，“百老汇”。收到。已派遣援军过去。肃清该区并等待他们的抵达。

Container.name: 105_Report
Container.situation: adams reports wounded aaf to hq

Container.name: 100_Treat
Container.situation: adams orders the player to treat the aaf

Key.Original: Sergeant, help him out. Take my kit if you need it.
Key.Chinese: 中士，幫助他一下。你有需要的話可以拿我的去用。
Key.Chinesesimp: 中士，帮帮帮他。你有需要的话可以拿我的急救包去用。

Container.name: 05_Near_Location
Container.situation: helicopter approaches convoy

Key.Original: Alright, we're coming up on the convoy's last known position.
Key.Chinese: 好，現在我們已經來到車隊的最後已知位置。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好，现在我们已经抵达车队的最后已知位置。
开始观察周边地面，伙计们。

Container.name: 03_Checkpoint
Container.situation: the helicopter passes the aaf checkpoint

Key.Chinesesimp: 那里是阿尔蒂斯武装力量的检查哨。

Key.Original: It's coming up on 20 minutes since their convoy was supposed to pass through there.
Key.Chinese: 那支車隊本該在20分鐘前就經過它了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 那支车队本该在20分钟前就经过这里了。

Container.name: 01_Start
Container.participants: BOOT B Adams;BOOT B HQ;BOOT B Lacey;
Container.situation: opening cutscene

Key.Original: Christ, did they put enough stairs in this thing?
Key.Chinese: 天殺的，他們到底有沒有放夠用的樓梯在這棟建築裡?
Key.Chinesesimp: 天杀的，他们到底有没有放足够用的楼梯在这栋建筑里?

Key.Original: Any word from the MoD sit-down, sir?
Key.Chinese: 有從國防部傳回任何會議的消息嗎，長官?
Key.Chinesesimp: 有任何关于国防部会谈的消息吗，长官?

Key.Original: Negative. Nothing from the AAF or the guerrillas.
Key.Chinese: 沒有。不管是AAF還是游擊隊，半點消息都沒有。
Key.Chinesesimp: 没有。不管是阿尔蒂斯武装力量还是游击队，半点消息都没有。

Key.Original: In fact, the whole thing's gone dark.
Key.Chinese: 事實上，整件事情應該是變糟了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 事实上，整件事情都没消息了。

Key.Original: Why do you think you boys are here?
Key.Chinese: 不然你們倆認為你們兩個人在這裡是要幹什麼?
Key.Chinesesimp: 不然你们俩认为你们是来干什么的?

Key.Original: Figure that missing Greenback convoy has something to do with it?
Key.Chinese: 找到那支失蹤的綠軍車隊能緩解情勢嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 找到那支失踪的绿军车队能缓解局势吗?

Key.Original: Find us that convoy, Staff Sergeant.
Good. And I'll try to un-fuck things here on this end.
Key.Chinese: 很好。我會在這裡盡力控制住局勢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 很好。我会在这里尽力控制住局势。
斯特拉蒂斯事件一年前

Key.Original: NATO peacekeepers conduct joint training exercises with members of the AAF.
Key.Chinese: NATO維和部隊正與AAF的士兵進行聯合訓練演習。
Key.Chinesesimp: 北约维和部队正与阿尔蒂斯武装力量的士兵进行联合训练。

Key.Original: Peacekeeping efforts continue in The Republic of Altis and Stratis following the Civil War. Although some progress has been made, the newly-established government still faces serious obstacles, namely the inexperience of the Altis Armed Forces, or AAF for short.%1Officially, NATO Peacekeepers, primarily stationed on Stratis, have been seconded to Altis to cooperate and consult with the AAF. Unofficially, they have been assisting with training members of the AAF in order to ensure their ability to maintain security within the Republic itself.%2Recently, however, member states of CSAT have expressed interest in the Republic, further increasing already-heightened global tensions with NATO.
Key.Chinese: 維和行動持續在剛經歷過內戰的Altis和Stratis共和國上進行著。儘管安全已經有些進展，但新成立的政府仍面臨嚴峻的考驗，他們的軍隊全名是Altis政府軍，簡稱AAF。%1表面上來說，NATO的維和部隊只駐紮在Stratis，但他們現在被調派到Altis主島上來與AAF進行合作。事實上，他們私底下仍持續訓練著AAF的士兵，好讓他們有能力自己維持島嶼的和平。%2然而，最近CSAT的會員國逐漸展現出對這個小共和國的興趣，使本已緊張的局勢更進一步升高。
Key.Chinesesimp: 维和行动在刚经历过内战的阿尔蒂斯和斯特拉蒂斯共和国内继续进行。尽管已经有了一些进展，但新成立的政府仍面临严峻的考验，特别缺乏经验的政府军，阿尔蒂斯武装力量。%1表面上来说，虽然北约维和部队基本只驻扎在斯特拉蒂斯，在阿尔蒂斯岛上只作为合作并提供顾问意见的次要力量。不过从非官方角度上，他们仍持续训练着阿尔蒂斯武装力量的士兵，以便让他们有能力自己维持共和国的和平。%2然而，最近广东协议同盟组织的成员国逐渐展现出对这个小共和国的兴趣，使本已紧张的局势进一步加剧。

Key.Chinese: 拿取步槍戰鬥光學瞄準鏡
Key.Chinesesimp: 拿取步枪战斗光学瞄准镜

Key.Original: Take the RCO from %1the crate%2 and equip it on your rifle.
Key.Chinese: 從%1裝備箱%2中拿取步槍戰鬥光學瞄準鏡，並把它裝備到步槍上。
Key.Chinesesimp: 从%1装备箱%2中拿取步枪战斗光学瞄准镜，并把它装备到步枪上。

Key.Original: Run to %1the target%2 and assemble it.
Key.Chinese: 跑到%1目標靶%2那邊並組裝它。
Key.Chinesesimp: 跑到%1靶子%2那边并组装它。

Container.name: x40_Left_Position_3
Container.situation: adams tells the player to get back to the shooting position

Key.Original: You're going to have a hard time if you don't fire from the shooting position, Sergeant.
Key.Chinese: 你再不回到射擊位上你就有麻煩了，中士。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你再不回到射击位上你就有麻烦了，中士。

Container.name: x35_Left_Position_2
Container.situation: adams tells the player to get back to the shooting position

Key.Original: Sergeant, please get back to the shooting position.
Key.Chinese: 中士，請返回到射擊位上。
Key.Chinesesimp: 中士，请返回到射击位上。

Container.name: x30_Left_Position_1
Container.situation: adams tells the player to get back to the shooting position

Key.Original: Back on the shooting position, Sergeant.

Container.name: x25_Long_3_Reprimand
Container.situation: adams points out the target

Key.Original: Sergeant, seriously, it's just in front of you. By the fence.
Key.Chinese: 中士，拜託你，它就在你的前面。柵欄邊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 中士，拜托你，它就在你的前面。栅栏边。

Container.name: x20_Long_3_Warning
Container.situation: adams reiterates the information on the target

Key.Original: ... Once more, just for the sake of clarity: 100 meters, bearing 290.
Key.Chinese: ...再提醒你一次:它距離100公尺，方位290。
Key.Chinesesimp: ...再提醒你一次:它距离100米，方位290。

Container.name: x15_Long_2_Reprimand
Container.situation: adams points out the target

Key.Original: Come on, Sergeant, it's right there. On top of the empty gas tank.
Key.Chinese: 拜託，中士，它就在那裡。在那個空油箱的頂部。
Key.Chinesesimp: 拜托，中士，它就在那里。在那个空油箱的顶部。

Container.name: x10_Long_2_Warning
Container.situation: adams reiterates the information on the target

Key.Original: ... For the sake of those watching at home, the target is at 400 meters, bearing 307.
Key.Chinese: ...你就不能表現更好點嗎，目標距離400公尺，方外307。
Key.Chinesesimp: ...你就不能表现更好点吗，目标距离400米，方位307。

Container.name: x05_Long_1_Reprimand
Container.situation: adams points out the target

Key.Original: Conway, it's over there, in the ruined building. You're making me look bad.
Key.Chinese: Conway，它在那邊，在那棟廢墟那邊。你讓我很丟臉。
Key.Chinesesimp: 康维，它在那边，在那栋废墟那边。你让我很丢脸。

Container.name: x01_Long_1_Warning
Container.situation: adams reiterates the information on the target

Key.Original: ... That's 300 meters away from you, at bearing 330, Sergeant.

Container.name: d20_Fatigue
Container.situation: adams instructs the trainees as to the importance of managing fatigue

Key.Original: 'What is the Sergeant doing?', I hear you ask.
Key.Chinese: '中士正在幹什麼?'，我聽到你們的問題了。
Key.Chinesesimp: '中士正在干什么?'，我听到你问了。

Key.Original: Well, in all honesty, I have no idea. Although, I think we can all agree, it's quite a sight to behold.
Key.Chinese: 恩，老實說，我也不知道。儘管我們都同意，他的表現的確很超凡脫俗。
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗯，老实说，我也不知道。尽管我们都同意这的确是个好景致。

Key.Original: However, his completely spontaneous and totally unplanned marathon conveniently brings us to our next lesson: fatigue.
Key.Chinese: 然而，有賴他馬拉松式的亂跑，這能讓我們更容易進入到下一個課題:疲勞。
Key.Chinesesimp: 然而，有赖他无目的且毫无计划性的马拉松长跑，我们能更能容易地进入到下一个课题:疲劳。

Key.Original: It can - and it will - be your worst nightmare in the field, should you fail to regulate it effectively.
Key.Chinese: 如果你們不好好調整你們的體力，它將是你們在戰場上遇到最大的敵人。
Key.Chinesesimp: 如果你们不好好调整你们的体力，它将是你们在战场上遇到最大的敌人。

Key.Original: Push yourself too hard, and you'll find yourself unable to hit shit - even when the situation requires otherwise.
Key.Chinese: 把你自己逼太緊，你將啥也打不到。
Key.Chinesesimp: 把自己搞得气喘吁吁，你将什么也打不到。

Key.Original: And, hell - if that's not enough for you - you'll just grow to hate the sound of your own wheezing.
Key.Chinese: 而且，如果這對你們來說還不夠的話-你們還會被自己的喘息聲所困擾。
Key.Chinesesimp: 而且，如果这对你们来说还不够的话-你们还会被自己的喘息声所困扰。

Container.name: d15_Run_Around
Container.situation: adams instructs lacey to teach the trainees about fatigue

Key.Original: While we're on the subject, you're going to find it much harder to control your breathing on the battlefield.
Key.Chinese: 接下來的這個課題，你將會發現我們在戰場上是很難保持穩定的呼吸狀態的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 接下来的这个课题，你将会发现我们在战场上是很难保持稳定的呼吸状态的。
你的粉丝们都在期待喔。

Container.name: d10_Ballistics_and_Bearings
Container.situation: adams switches the lesson to bearings

Key.Original: From now on, I will be giving directions to the Sergeant exclusively in compass bearings. So, please, pay attention.
Key.Chinese: 現在開始，我將會給予中士指北針的方位與距離。所以拜託，請保持專心。
Key.Chinesesimp: 现在开始，我将会给予中士指北针的方位与距离。所以拜托，请保持专心。

Key.Original: I'll call out specific targets for the Sergeant to engage. It's up to him to pick them out and score a hit.
Key.Chinese: 我會叫出幾個特殊目標給中士擊打。讓我們看看他如何找到目標並擊倒之。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我会叫出几个特殊靶子给中士打。让我们看看他如何找到目标并将其击倒。

Container.name: d05_AAF_Anger
Container.situation: adams starts getting angry with the aaf pestering him

Key.Original: Y'know, I don't get annoyed easily-
Key.Chinese: 你知道嗎，我向來脾氣很好-
Key.Chinesesimp: 你知道吗，我向来脾气很好-

Key.Original: - but this guy? This guy's a special kind of fuckwit.
Key.Chinese: -但是這些傢伙?這些傢伙真是有夠他媽的煩人。
Key.Chinesesimp: -但是这些家伙?这些家伙真他妈的烦人。

Container.name: d01_Hello_World
Container.situation: lacey and adams return to the real world

Key.Chinese: 喔...看來我們的新兵來了。

Key.Original: Not bad. Not bad at all.
Shit. Looks like I missed one.
Key.Chinese: 該死。看來有一個我忘記裝起來了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死。看来有一个我忘记装起来了。

Key.Original: Tell you what: you go get it working. I'll get things set up here.
Key.Chinese: 這麼辦好了:你去搞定它。我會先把這邊安置妥當。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这么办好了:你去搞定它。我会先把这边安置妥当。

Container.name: 95_Started_Composed
Container.situation: the player didn't overly fatigue himself while running

Key.Original: The Sergeant paced himself well as he ran around. As such, he's got it much easier when he engages targets.
Key.Chinese: 中士在跑來跑去時有注意去調整他的節奏。因為這樣，他等下能更容易的擊中目標。
Key.Chinesesimp: 中士在跑来跑去时有注意去调整他的节奏。因为这样，他等下会更容易的击中目标。

Container.name: 90_Shot_Composed
Container.situation: the player engaged the targets after composing himself

Key.Original: You'll notice the Sergeant composed himself before he opened up.
Key.Chinese: 你會注意到，中士在開火前會先讓自己沉靜下來。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你会注意到，中士在开火前会先让自己平静下来。

Container.name: 85_Shot_Fatigued
Container.situation: the player engaged the targets while still fatigued

Key.Original: See? Now the Sergeant has to battle himself as he fires.
Key.Chinese: 看到了嗎?現在中士必須與自己氣喘噓噓的身體戰鬥。
Key.Chinesesimp: 看到了吗?现在中士必须与自己气喘吁吁的身体战斗。

Container.name: 80_Shoot_All
Container.situation: adams orders the player to engage all targets

Key.Chinese: 接下來就看你的了，中士。
Key.Chinesesimp: 接下来就看你的了，中士。

Container.name: 75_Targets_Down
Container.situation: player hit all targets

Container.name: 70_Hold_Breath
Container.situation: adams reminds the trainees to control their breathing

Key.Original: Remember: control your breathing. Aim for clean, focused shots.
Key.Chinese: 請記住:控制你的呼吸。先瞄準，再憋氣，最後射擊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 请记住:控制你的呼吸。先瞄准，再憋气，最后射击。

Container.name: 65_Long_3
Container.situation: adams tells player to engage the target

Container.name: 60_Long_2
Container.situation: adams tells player to engage the target

Container.name: 55_Long_1
Container.situation: adams tells player to engage the target

Container.name: 50_Take_Scope
Container.situation: adams tells the player to take the scope

Key.Original: Engaging targets at greater distances is a bit more complicated. Collimator sights - like the sergeant here is using - are not well suited to the task.
Key.Chinese: 與較遠的目標交戰就又更複雜了。像是中士正在用的這個瞄具，就並不適用於這個任務。
Key.Chinesesimp: 与较远的目标交战就更复杂了。像中士正在用的这个瞄具就并不适用于这个任务。

Key.Original: Sergeant, go ahead and grab the RCO from the crate.
Key.Chinese: 中士，請在你身旁的箱子中拿取一個步槍戰鬥光學瞄準鏡並裝上它。
Key.Chinesesimp: 中士，请在你身旁的箱子中拿取一个步枪战斗光学瞄准镜并装上它。

Container.name: 49_CSAT
Container.participants: BOOT I Soldier B;BOOT B Adams;
Container.situation: csat helicopters fly by in the distance

Key.Chinese: 直升機?哇嗚。?曹操曹操到。
Key.Chinesesimp: 直升机?好吧。说曹操曹操到。

Container.name: 45_Suggest_Prone
Container.situation: adams explains the pros and cons of firing while prone

Key.Original: Going prone offers the best stationary shooting posture, with the least recoil and smallest profile.
Key.Chinese: 趴下能使射擊姿態最為穩定，並在不暴露身體的狀態下進行射擊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 趴下能使射击姿态最为稳定，并在不暴露身体的状态下进行射击。

Key.Original: However, be careful of grass and other obstacles obstructing your view.
Key.Chinese: 然而，你也得小心草或其他的障礙物去阻擋到你的視線。
Key.Chinesesimp: 然而，你也得小心草或其他的障碍物阻挡你的视线。

Container.name: 40_Suggest_Crouch
Container.situation: adams explains the pros and cons of firing while crouched

Key.Original: Were he to take a knee, the effort he'd have to put in compensating for the recoil would be reduced.
Key.Chinese: 當他蹲下時，後座力對他的衝擊就會減少。
Key.Chinesesimp: 当他蹲下时，后座力对他的冲击就会减少。

Key.Original: So - whenever possible - try to crouch down before firing.
Key.Chinese: 所以-只要有機會的話-請試著在開火前就蹲下。
Key.Chinesesimp: 所以-只要有机会的话-请试着在开火前就蹲下。

Container.name: 35_Suggest_Stand
Container.situation: adams explains the pros and cons of firing while standing

Key.Original: If he'd remained standing, he'd've had a tougher time compensating for recoil. It's not impossible, but it's also not ideal.
Key.Chinese: 假如他持續站立，他必須努力與後座力抗衡。這並不是不可能，但不是很推薦你們這樣做。
Key.Chinesesimp: 假如他持续站立，他必须努力与后座力抗衡。这并不是不可能，但不是很推荐你们这样做。

Container.name: 30_Shot_Prone
Container.situation: player took his first shot while prone

Key.Original: Ah, I see the Sergeant went prone before engaging the targets. As such, he has the least amount of recoil to deal with, and maintains a lower profile.
Key.Chinese: 恩，接下來我們看到中士在開火前使用了趴姿。這樣能使後座力的效果降到最低，並且保持身體輪廓不被暴露。
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗯，接下来我们看到中士在开火前使用了卧姿。这样能使后座力的效果降到最低，并且保持身体轮廓不被暴露。

Container.name: 25_Shot_Crouch
Container.situation: player took his first shot while crouching

Key.Original: You'll notice that the Sergeant took a knee before firing, which creates a more stable firing position. Try to do this as much as possible.
Key.Chinese: 你們現在會發現，中士在射擊前採取了蹲姿，這讓他能更穩定的射擊。請試著在開火時盡量保持這個動作。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你们现在会发现，中士在射击前采取了蹲姿，这让他能更稳定的射击。请试着在开火时尽量保持这个动作。

Container.name: 20_Shot_Stand
Container.situation: player took his first shot while standing

Key.Original: As you can see, while the Sergeant remains standing upright, he has to work harder to compensate for the recoil.
Key.Chinese: 就像你們看到的，當中士用站姿射擊時，他必須多花更多力氣去抵銷後座力所產生的效果。
Key.Chinesesimp: 就像你们看到的，当中士用站姿射击时，他必须多花更多力气去抵消后座力所产生的效果。

Container.name: 15_Introduction
Container.participants: BOOT B Adams;BOOT I Soldier B;
Container.situation: adams introduces himself and lacey

Key.Original: I'm Staff Sergeant Adams, this is Sergeant Conway. We'll be your cabin crew for today.
Key.Chinese: 我是上士Adams，而這位是中士Conway。我們今天將是你們的服務員。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我是上士亚当斯，而这位是中士康维。我们今天将是你们的服务员。

Key.Original: Since I'm fairly confident we all know why we're here, I'll skip the usual brief.
Key.Chinese: 因為我很確信我們都清楚今天要在這裡幹什麼，讓我跳過閒話家常的階段吧。
Key.Chinesesimp: 因为我很确信我们都知道今天在这儿要干什么，让我跳过闲话家常的阶段吧。

Key.Original: So, over to you, Sergeant. When you're ready, put some rounds downrange.
Key.Chinese: 好的，看你了，中士。當你準備好時，請開始對目標射擊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，看你了，中士。当你准备好时，请开始对靶子射击。

Container.name: 110_Incident
Container.situation: aaf once again interrupt adams

Key.Original: American, please, I need to speak with you. There has been an... Incident. Over.
Key.Chinese: 美國佬，抱歉，我有件事必須跟你報備。我們這裡，呵...有點意外。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 美国佬，抱歉，我得跟你谈谈。我们这里，有...有起事件。完毕。

Container.name: 10_Assembled
Container.participants: BOOT B Lacey;BOOT B Adams;BOOT I Soldier B;
Container.situation: player assembles the target

Key.Chinese: 收到。好的，所有人!靠過來。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到。好的，所有人!靠过来。

Key.Original: Sorry, they're all we've got on hand.
Key.Chinese: 抱歉，它們是我們手上僅有的了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 抱歉，我们只有这种式样的。
广协同盟靶子?没搞错吧?

Container.name: 105_All_Down
Container.situation: player hit all targets

Container.name: 100_Watch_Yourself
Container.situation: adams instructs the aaf on the importance of controlling breathing

Key.Original: Again, you need to control your stamina. If you don't, you'll have a hard time hitting anything at all.
Key.Chinese: 再說一次，你們必須掌控你們的體力。假如不好好分配體力，你們會有好一段時間會射不中目標。
Key.Chinesesimp: 再说一次，你们必须掌控你们的体力。假如不好好分配体力，你们会有好一段时间会射不中目标。

Container.name: 05_Annoying
Container.participants: BOOT I Soldier A;BOOT B Adams;
Container.situation: aaf continues to pester adams

Key.Original: I'm sorry, I thought I told you to go bother someone else?
Key.Chinese: 很抱歉，我剛剛不是叫你們去煩別人了嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 不好意思，我刚刚不是叫你们去烦别人了吗?

Container.name: 01_Start
Container.situation: adams tells the player to come to him

Key.Chinese: 現在來體驗點不一樣的東西吧。
Key.Chinesesimp: 现在来体验点不一样的东西吧。

Key.Original: Use the compass to locate the target at bearing 220.
Key.Chinese: 使用指北針尋找方位220的目標。
Key.Chinesesimp: 使用指北针寻找方位220的目标。

Key.Original: Use the compass to locate the target to the east.
Key.Chinese: 使用指北針尋找東方的目標。
Key.Chinesesimp: 使用指北针寻找东方的目标。

Key.Original: Shoot each of the available targets.
Move to the final marker to complete the course.
Key.Chinese: 移動到最後一個標記點來完成訓練課程。
Key.Chinesesimp: 移动到最后一个标记点来完成训练课程。

Key.Original: Move to the second marker and engage the targets.
Key.Chinese: 經過第二個標記點，並擊倒所有的目標。
Key.Chinesesimp: 通过第二个标记点，并击倒所有的目标。

Key.Original: Move to the first marker and engage the targets.
Key.Chinese: 經過第一個標記點，並擊倒所有的目標。
Key.Chinesesimp: 通过第一个标记点，并击倒所有的目标。

Container.name: x25_Ammo_Depleted_3
Container.situation: player runs out of ammo

Key.Original: Try not to run out of them this time, Sergeant.
Key.Chinese: 這次請試著不要用光它們了，中士。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这次请试着不要用光它们了，中士。

Container.name: x20_Ammo_Depleted_2
Container.situation: player runs out of ammo

Key.Original: Hope you don't waste rounds like this in the real world, Conway.
Key.Chinese: 我希望你在現實世界中不會像在這邊一樣浪費彈藥，Conway。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我希望你在现实世界中不会像在这边一样浪费弹药，康维。

Container.name: x15_Ammo_Depleted_1
Container.situation: player runs out of ammo

Key.Original: Good thing those aren't real rounds at this rate, Sergeant.
Key.Chinese: 好在你不是在擊發真正的彈藥，中士。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好在你不是击发真正的弹药，中士。

Container.name: x10_Adams_Shot_3
Container.situation: player tries to shoot adams

Key.Original: Come on, cut it out, Conway.

Container.name: x05_Adams_Shot_2
Container.situation: player tries to shoot adams

Container.name: x01_Adams_Shot_1
Container.situation: player tries to shoot adams

Container.name: d20_Shutdown
Container.situation: adams and lacey shut down the vr program

Key.Original: Well, I think it's safe to say it's working as advertized.
Key.Chinese: 很好，我想這系統就做得跟他的廣告一樣好。
Key.Chinesesimp: 很好，我想这系统就做得跟它的广告一样好。

Key.Original: Alright, let's shut it down. The Greenbacks are gonna get here soon.
Key.Chinese: 好的，讓我們先關機吧。綠軍很快就會到這邊了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，让我们先关机吧。绿军很快就会到这边了。

Key.Chinese: 你還想再放坦克在我旁邊嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你还想再放坦克在我旁边吗?

Container.name: d15_Deaf
Container.situation: adams spawns a tank and fires its cannon close to lacey

Key.Original: Jesus Christ! Deafen me, why don't you?
Key.Chinese: 天殺的!這可震聾我了，你在搞啥?
Key.Chinesesimp: 活见鬼!你怎么不干脆把我震聋啊?

Container.name: d10_Fun
Container.situation: adams spawns and plays with a helicopter, lacey notices

Container.name: d05_Course
Container.situation: adams tells lacey what to expect with the course

Key.Original: So, uh... Looks like it wants you to run from marker to marker as fast as you can.
Key.Chinese: 恩...看來它希望你跑過這些標記點越快越好。
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗯...看来它希望你跑过这些标记点越快越好。

Key.Original: Yeah, it says here that, uh... It'll spawn targets at each marker. You'll need to drop them before you can proceed.
Key.Chinese: 是阿，是這個系統說的，喔...我會在下個標記點生些目標給你。你必須先放倒他們在移動到下個標記點。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是啊，是这个系统说的，喔...我会在下个标记点生些目标给你。你必须先放倒他们在移动到下个标记点。

Key.Original: Oh, that's what 'it' wants, huh? Great...
Key.Chinese: 喔，這真的是'它'所希望的，恩?太棒了...
Key.Chinesesimp: 喔，这真的是'它'所希望的，嗯?太棒了...

Container.name: d01_Reveal
Container.situation: vr program boots, player sees the world for the first time

Key.Original: Okay... Let's see what this baby can do...
Key.Chinese: 好的...讓我們看看這寶貝可以幹到哪些事...
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的...让我们看看这宝贝可以干哪些事...

Key.Chinese: 是阿，你沒在跟我開玩笑。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是啊，你没在跟我开玩笑。

Container.name: 65_Interruption
Container.situation: adams gets interrupted by a radio message from nearby aaf

Key.Original: Uh... Yes, this is Staff Sergeant Adams. Send it.
Key.Chinesesimp: 呵...是，这里是上士亚当斯。请说。

Key.Original: You know what? Go bother someone else. Out.
Key.Chinese: 你知道嗎?請你去煩別人，好嗎。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我告诉你，请你去烦别人好吗。通话完毕。
阿尔蒂斯武装力量那帮白痴...

Container.name: 60_To_Start
Container.situation: adams tells the player to move to the start of the course

Key.Original: Sergeant, if you'd be so kind?

Container.name: 55_All_Down
Container.situation: player hits the second target, adams moves on

Key.Original: Moving along... Ah, here we go.

Container.name: 50_Second_Target
Container.situation: adams tells the player the location of the second target

Container.name: 45_Bearings
Container.situation: player hits the target, adams moves on to giving bearings instead

Key.Chinese: 好，讓我們嘗試定位一下。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好，让我们尝试定位一下。

Container.name: 40_First_Target
Container.situation: adams tells the player the location of his first target

Key.Original: Next one's just east of you.

Container.name: 35_Compass
Container.situation: adams starts player's orientation

Key.Original: Great. Targeting and ballistics look normal.
Key.Chinese: 很好。瞄準和彈道看起來一切正常。
Key.Chinesesimp: 很好。瞄准和弹道看起来一切正常。

Key.Original: Let's get you orientated. Bring up your compass.
Key.Chinese: 讓我們來校正方位。拿出你的指北針。
Key.Chinesesimp: 让我们来校正方位。拿出你的指北针。

Container.name: 30_Fire
Container.situation: adams tells the player to engage the targets

Container.name: 25_Targets_Spawned
Container.situation: adams spawns two targets, one after the other

Container.name: 20_Targets
Container.situation: adams prepares the targets for the player

Key.Original: Now, let's give you something to shoot at...
Key.Chinese: 現在，讓我們給點目標給你射擊...
Key.Chinesesimp: 现在，让我们给点目标让你射击...

Container.name: 15_Move
Container.situation: adams tells the player to go to him

Container.name: 10_Surprised
Container.situation: adams teleports, surprises lacey

Container.name: 05_Turn_On
Container.situation: vr program boots

Key.Original: There we go... Calibrating... Looking good so far.
Key.Chinese: 我們進來了...校準中...看來一切正常。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们进来了...校准中...看来一切正常。

Container.name: 01_Start
Container.situation: starting the vr program

Key.Original: Wait until a Recruit joins the training session
Key.Chinese: 等待一名新兵加入遊戲
Key.Chinesesimp: 等待一名新兵加入游戏

Key.Original: Wait until an Instructor joins the session
Key.Chinese: 等待一名教官加入遊戲
Key.Chinesesimp: 等待一名教官加入游戏

Key.Original: Place a Training > Stage module in order to select the next Training Stage.
Key.Chinese: 請放置訓練>課程模塊，好讓訓練課程開始進行。
Key.Chinesesimp: 请放置训练>课程模块，好让训练课程开始进行。

Key.Original: Guide your Recruits to reach the Motorized Vehicle Obstacle Course.
Key.Chinese: 引導你的新兵前往摩托化載具障礙場。
Key.Chinesesimp: 引导你的新兵前往摩托化载具障碍场。

Key.Original: Guide your Recruits back to base.
Key.Chinese: 引導你的新兵回到基地。
Key.Chinesesimp: 引导你的新兵回到基地。

Key.Original: Make sure your recruits move in convoy. Vehicles must be at a range of 50 meters between each other, vehicles must be moving at a minimum of 5 km/h, the maximum direction offset of vehicles is 100 degrees and the vehicles must be driving on a road.
Key.Chinese: 請確保你新兵的載具開在車隊中間。載具間隔必須保持在50公尺左右，速度維持在最小的5km/h，最大偏移量不超過100度，並且不要開到道路之外。
Key.Chinesesimp: 请确保你新兵的载具开在车队中间。载具间隔必须保持在50公尺左右，速度维持在最小的5km/h，最大偏移量不超过100度，并且不要开到道路之外。

Key.Original: Each of your recruits must board a land vehicle as driver.
Key.Chinese: 每個新兵必須進入載具並擔當駕駛。
Key.Chinesesimp: 每个新兵必须进入载具并担任驾驶。

Key.Original: Each of your Recruits must finish the Vehicle Firing Range with a score of at least 5 targets hit.
Key.Chinese: 每個新兵在離開載具靶場前，必須都要擁有命中5個目標以上的成績。
Key.Chinesesimp: 每个新兵在离开载具靶场前，必须都要拥有命中5个目标以上的成绩。

Key.Original: Guide your Recruits to reach the Vehicle Firing Range using the vehicle previously created.
Key.Chinese: 引導你的新兵前往載具靶場。
Key.Chinesesimp: 引导你的新兵前往载具靶场。

Key.Original: Create a Hunter and make sure all your Recruits board it.
Key.Chinese: 創建一臺Hunter，並讓你的新兵進入它。
Key.Chinesesimp: 创建一台“猎人”，并让你的新兵进入它。

Key.Original: Each Recruit must finish the Vehicle Obstacle Course with the quad bike under 1 minute and 10 seconds.
Key.Chinese: 每名新兵必須使用四輪摩托車來完成障礙場，而成績必須低於1分10秒。
Key.Chinesesimp: 每名新兵必须使用四轮摩托车来完成障碍场，而成绩必须低于1分10秒。

Key.Original: Each recruit must board a quad bike as a driver.
Key.Chinese: 每名新兵必須登上四輪摩托車擔當駕駛。
Key.Chinesesimp: 每名新兵必须登上四轮摩托车担任驾驶。

Key.Original: Guide your Recruits to reach the Motorized Vehicle Obstacle Course.
Key.Chinese: 引導你的新兵前往摩托化載具障礙場。
Key.Chinesesimp: 引导你的新兵前往摩托化载具障碍场。

Key.Original: Recruits learn the basics of Infantry control and movement, with weapon handling and firing.
Key.Chinese: 讓新兵學習基本步兵控制，移動，武器掌握與射擊技巧。
Key.Chinesesimp: 让新兵学习基本步兵控制，移动，武器掌握与射击技巧。

Key.Original: A small enemy recon team spotted near Antharakia, guide your Recruits to the designated position without being detected by the enemy units.
Key.Chinese: 一小支敵人的巡邏隊在Antharakia附近出沒，引導你的新兵前往指定的位置，不要被敵人發現了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 一小支敌人的巡逻队在阿塔拉基亚附近出没，引导你的新兵前往指定的位置且不要被敌人发现。

Key.Original: Make sure each of your Recruits have a Rifle and a Pistol.
Key.Chinese: 確保你的新兵每個人都有步槍與手槍。
Key.Chinesesimp: 确保你的新兵每个人都有步枪与手枪。

Key.Original: Each of your Recruits must score, at least, 10 targets, with a rifle.
Key.Chinese: 每名新兵必須使用步槍擊中10個目標。
Key.Chinesesimp: 每名新兵必须使用步枪击中10个目标。

Key.Original: Each of your Recruits must score, at least, 10 targets, with a pistol.
Key.Chinese: 每名新兵必須使用手槍擊中10個目標。
Key.Chinesesimp: 每名新兵必须使用手枪击中10个目标。

Key.Original: Guide your Recruits to reach the Weapons Firing Range.
Key.Chinese: 引導你的新兵前往武器靶場。
Key.Chinesesimp: 引导你的新兵前往武器靶场。

Key.Original: Each of your Recruits must score, at least, 3 hits within the Grenade Firing Range.
Key.Chinese: 每名新兵必須在手榴彈靶場得到3分以上。
Key.Chinesesimp: 每名新兵必须在手榴弹靶场得到3分以上。

Key.Original: Guide your Recruits to reach the Grenade Firing Range.
Key.Chinese: 引導你的新兵前往手榴彈靶場。
Key.Chinesesimp: 引导你的新兵前往手榴弹靶场。

Key.Original: Guide the Recruits to finish the Infantry Obstacle Course under 1 minute and 25 seconds.
Key.Chinese: 引導你的新兵完成步兵障礙場的挑戰，時間必須低於1分25秒。
Key.Chinesesimp: 引导你的新兵完成步兵障碍场的挑战，时间必须低于1分25秒。

Key.Original: Guide your Recruits to reach the Infantry Obstacle Course.
Key.Chinese: 引導你的新兵前往步兵障礙場。
Key.Chinesesimp: 引导你的新兵前往步兵障碍场。

Key.Original: Await your Recruits arrival to the Airport.
Key.Chinese: 等待你的新兵回到機場。
Key.Chinesesimp: 等待你的新兵回到机场。

Key.Original: A vehicle is being sent to the Recruits´ position, make sure all Recruits enter its cargo.
Key.Chinese: 一臺載具被送往新兵的身旁了，請確保所有新兵都已上車。
Key.Chinesesimp: 一台载具被送往新兵的身旁了，请确保所有新兵都已上车。

Key.Original: Guide your Recruits to the enemy position and make sure the enemy presence is terminated.
Key.Chinese: 引導你的新兵前往敵人的位置，並肅清該地。
Key.Chinesesimp: 引导你的新兵前往敌人的位置，并肃清该地。

Key.Original: Go through a series of bootcamp activities with friends.
Key.Chinese: 與朋友一同參與一系列的新兵教學任務。
Key.Chinesesimp: 与朋友一同参与一系列的新兵教学任务。

Key.Chinese: 你已經完成新兵訓練了。恭喜你。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你已经完成新兵训练了。恭喜你。

Key.Original: You have completed the Bootcamp by leading your recruits and showing them the basics of Arma. Congratulations.
Key.Chinese: 你已經帶領你的新兵完成所有的課程。幹的好。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你已经带领你的新兵完成所有的课程。干的好。

Key.Original:
Welcome to the Bootcamp,

NATO is in the process of providing us with their knowhow in the military field by training freshly arrived Recruits in order to make sure we, the local army, are able to keep security of our island intact.
Key.Chinese:
歡迎來到新兵訓練，

NATO的維和部隊正與政府軍進行聯合訓練中，為了使成立不久的政府軍有能力可以自己守衛他們的島嶼。
Key.Chinesesimp:
欢迎来到新兵训练，

北约的维和部队正与政府军进行联合训练中，为了使成立不久的政府军有能力可以自己守卫他们的岛屿。

Key.Original: Within our Bootcamp, you can find two unique Obstacle Courses, one aimed at <marker name='BIS_obstacleCourse_infantry'>Infantry</marker> movement and another used for <marker name='BIS_obstacleCourse_vehicles'>Vehicle</marker> handling training.
Key.Chinese: 在我們的新兵訓練中，你可以找到兩個不一樣的障礙課程，其中一個是針對<markername='BIS_obstacleCourse_infantry'>步兵</marker>的移動，另一個是<markername='BIS_obstacleCourse_vehicles'>載具</marker>的掌握訓練。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在我们的新兵训练中，你可以找到两个不一样的障碍课程，其中一个是针对<markername='BIS_obstacleCourse_infantry'>步兵</marker>的移动，另一个是<markername='BIS_obstacleCourse_vehicles'>载具</marker>的掌握训练。

Key.Original: Within our Bootcamp, you can find three different Firing Ranges, the <marker name='BIS_firingRange_grenade'>Grenade Firing Range</marker>, <marker name='BIS_firingRange_weapon'>Weapons Firing Range</marker> and the <marker name='BIS_firingRange_vehicle'>Vehicle Firing Range</marker>.
Key.Chinese: 在我們的新兵訓練中，你可以找到三個不同的靶場，有<markername='BIS_firingRange_grenade'>手榴彈靶場</marker>，<markername='BIS_firingRange_weapon'>武器靶場</marker>以及<markername='BIS_firingRange_vehicle'>載具靶場</marker>。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在我们的新兵训练中，你可以找到三个不同的靶场，有<markername='BIS_firingRange_grenade'>手榴弹靶场</marker>，<markername='BIS_firingRange_weapon'>武器靶场</marker>以及<markername='BIS_firingRange_vehicle'>载具靶场</marker>。

Key.Original:
By the book,

You not only have the chance, but it is also advised to go through each researched, documented and iterated course of training.
These include the Infantry Stage and the Motorized Vehicle Course and can be accessed through the Zeus interface, within the CREATE section, Modules - Training - Bootcamp Stage and place it.

Infantry Stage:
- Guide your Recruits through the Infantry Course and show them the basics of Infantry movement, weapon handling and real world exercise, it is said that, after completing this course, a Recruit is able to behave like a soldier in the front line of a battlefield.

Motorized Vehicles Stage:
- Take your Recruits through the Motorized Vehicles Course and show them the basics of driving a vehicle through a rought terrain, using it's weapons and a real world exercise. There is a considerable amount of reports that after going through this course, a Recruit is able to participate in an operation where he will drive or shoot from a vehicle.
Key.Chinese:
藉由此次訓練課程，

你不僅能教新兵你知道的知識，你還可以透過宙斯的系統來發考題給他們。
你可以在宙斯介面中的模塊中，找到訓練課程這個模塊，讓你開始步兵或載具課程。

步兵課程:
-引導你的新兵學習基本步兵移動，武器掌握與實戰體驗，在完成這個課程後，新兵應該就能應付戰場前線的情況。

摩托化載具課程e:
-帶領你的新兵學習載具的掌握，像是駛過複雜的地形，使用車載武器等等。在完成這個課程後，新兵應該就能應付基本的載具任務了。
Key.Chinesesimp:
藉由此次训练课程，

你不仅能教新兵你知道的知识，你还可以透过宙斯的系统来发考题给他们。
你可以在宙斯界面中的模块中，找到训练课程这个模块，让你开始步兵或载具课程。

步兵课程:
-引导你的新兵学习基本步兵移动，武器掌握与实战体验，在完成这个课程后，新兵应该就能应对战场前线的情况。

摩托化载具课程e:
-带领你的新兵学习载具的掌握，像是驶过复杂的地形，使用车载武器等等。在完成这个课程后，新兵应该就能应对基本的载具任务了。

Key.Original:
Within our Bootcamp, you can find two unique Obstacle Courses, one aimed at Infantry movement and another used for Vehicle handling training.

You are expected to guide your Recruits through these courses in order to give them a sense of what moving, crawling through rough places and driving a vehicle actually means.

You are free to participate in a course, which is a good way how to show your Recruits how to do it.
Key.Chinese:
在我們的新兵訓練中，你可以找到兩個不一樣的障礙課程，其中一個是針對步兵的移動，另一個是載具的掌握訓練。

你必須教會你的新兵關於基礎移動的感覺，爬過粗糙的地形與掌握駕駛載具的精髓。

你也可以親自駕駛載具給新兵們看，畢竟身教重於言教。
Key.Chinesesimp:
在我们的新兵训练中，你可以找到两个不一样的障碍课程，其中一个是针对步兵的移动，另一个是载具的掌握训练。

你必须教会你的新兵关于基础移动的知识，爬过崎岖的地形与掌握驾驶载具的精髓。

你也可以亲自驾驶载具给新兵们看，毕竟言传不如身教。

Key.Original:
The way you want,

You are expected to share your skills with your Recruits in the way you see fit. You are not required to go through the Bootcamp Courses of Training (Bootcamp Module) and you can use the tools at your disposal to teach your Recruits what it means to be in a battlefield.
Key.Chinese:
訓練的方式由你決定，

你可以客製化適合你跟新兵的課程。不一定要照預定的課程去執行，使用我們給予你的工具，隨時發考題給這群新兵，教會他們什麼是戰場。
Key.Chinesesimp:
训练的方式由你决定，

你可以自定义适合你跟新兵的课程。不一定要照预定的课程去执行，使用我们给予你的工具，随时发考题给这群新兵，教会他们什么是战场。

Key.Original:
Welcome to the Bootcamp,

You were asked to share your skills and expertise in the NATO effort to train the Altis local military, the AAF.
Key.Chinese:
歡迎來到新兵訓練，

你將要分享你的經驗與技巧給新兵。
Key.Chinesesimp:
欢迎来到新兵训练，

你将要分享你的经验与技巧给新兵。

Key.Original:
Within our Bootcamp, you can find three different Firing Ranges, the Grenade Firing Range, Weapons Firing Range and the Vehicle Firing Range.

You are expected to guide your Recruits through these courses in order to give them a sense of what moving, crawling through rough places and driving a vehicle actually means.

You are free to participate in a firing range, which is a good way how to show your Recruits how to do it.
Key.Chinese:
在我們的新兵訓練中，你可以找到三個不同的靶場，有手榴彈靶場，武器靶場以及載具靶場。

你必須教會你的新兵關於基礎移動的感覺，爬過粗糙的地形與掌握駕駛載具的精髓。

你可以親自下去靶場射擊，這是個機會去演示給新兵看。
Key.Chinesesimp:
在我们的新兵训练中，你可以找到三个不同的靶场，有手榴弹靶场，武器靶场以及载具靶场。

你必须教会你的新兵关于基础移动的知识，爬过崎岖的地形与掌握驾驶载具的精髓。

你可以亲自下去靶场射击，这是个机会去演示给新兵看。

Key.Original: Check your Score at the Score Board
Key.Chinese: 去記分板檢查你的分數
Key.Chinesesimp: 去记分板检查你的分数

Key.Original: Members of the AAF require assistance from NATO peacekeepers.
Key.Chinese: AAF的隊員向NATO維和部隊請求支援。
Key.Chinesesimp: 阿尔蒂斯武装力量人员向北约维和部队请求支援。

Key.Original: While on a training exercise, NATO peacekeepers have been contacted by nearby AAF.
Key.Chinese: 正當訓練進行時，NATO維和部隊接獲到附近AAF部隊的支援請求。
Key.Chinesesimp: 正当训练进行中，北约维和部队接到了附近阿尔蒂斯武装力量部队的支援请求。

Key.Original: Sweep each of the remaining buildings for potential threats.
Key.Chinese: 掃蕩其餘建築，搜尋潛在威脅。
Key.Chinesesimp: 扫荡其余建筑，搜寻潜在威胁。
返回到%1上士亚当斯%2旁边。
找到阿尔蒂斯武装力量部队

Key.Original: Use the information provided to find the location of the AAF.
Key.Chinese: 使用AAF他們提供的情報，進而定位出他們的地點。
Key.Chinesesimp: 使用阿尔蒂斯武装力量人员提供的情报，定位出他们的地点。

Key.Original: Get in the Hunter as the driver.

Key.Chinesesimp: 驶往阿尔蒂斯武装力量人员那里

Key.Chinese: 開車載你的隊友前往%1AAF%2那邊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 开车载你的小组前往%1阿尔蒂斯武装力量人员%2的位置。

Container.name: x60_Already_Cleared
Container.situation: player checks the building that was already cleared

Key.Chinese: 他們已經肅清過這棟了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们已经肃清过这栋了。

Container.name: x55_Closed_Map_3
Container.situation: player closes the map before being told

Key.Original: Sergeant, please, keep your map out.
Key.Chinese: 中士，拜託，請拿出你的地圖。
Key.Chinesesimp: 中士，拜托，请拿出你的地图。

Container.name: x50_Closed_Map_2
Container.situation: player closes the map before being told

Key.Original: Conway, stop messing around. Show us your map.
Key.Chinese: Conway，停止胡鬧了。給我們看你的地圖。
Key.Chinesesimp: 康维，停止胡闹了。给我们看你的地图。

Container.name: x45_Closed_Map_1
Container.situation: player closes the map before being told

Key.Original: Come on, Sergeant. Keep your map out.
Key.Chinese: 拜託，中士。把你的地圖給拿出來。
Key.Chinesesimp: 拜托，中士。把你的地图给拿出来。

Container.name: x40_Mark_Location_Again
Container.situation: adams tells the player to continue

Key.Original: Figure you know where they are now, Sergeant?
Key.Chinese: 這下你知道他們的位置了嗎，中士?
Key.Chinesesimp: 这下你知道他们的位置了吗，中士?

Container.name: x35_Mark_Location_Info
Container.participants: BOOT B Adams;BOOT I Soldier A;
Container.situation: adams asks the aaf for more information

Key.Original: Are you guys around some buildings, or are you in the middle of nowhere?
Key.Chinese: 你們附近有任何建築嗎，還是身處在蠻荒之地?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你们附近有任何建筑吗，还是身处在蛮荒之地?

Key.Original: So you have another road leading to you?
Key.Chinese: 所以有另一條路前往你們那邊?
Key.Chinesesimp: 所以有另一条路前往你们那边?

Key.Original: We are in a small settlement, just off the main road.
Key.Chinese: 我們在主要道路旁的一座小村莊中。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们在主要道路旁的一座小村庄中。

Key.Original: Yes, a dirt track. It took us northeast from the main road itself.
Key.Chinese: 是的，一條泥土道路。它把我們帶領到主要道路的東北方。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是的，一条泥土道路。它把我们带领到主要道路的东北方。

Container.name: x30_Mark_Location_Wrong
Container.situation: player takes too long or marks the wrong location

Container.name: x25_Mark_Hill_Wrong_2
Container.situation: player takes too long or marks the wrong location again

Container.name: x20_Mark_Hill_Wrong_1
Container.situation: player takes too long or marks the wrong location

Key.Original: A hill with a chapel, Sergeant. Southwest of Syrta.
Key.Chinese: 一個有禮拜堂的小山，中士。Syrta的西南方。
Key.Chinesesimp: 一个有礼拜堂的小山，中士。西尔塔的西南方。

Container.name: x15_Mark_Town_Wrong_2
Container.situation: player takes too long or marks the wrong location again

Key.Original: Conway. Syrta. Big letters. Mark it.
Key.Chinesesimp: 康维。西尔塔。那个大字。标记上去。

Container.name: x10_Mark_Town_Wrong_1
Container.situation: player takes too long or marks the wrong location

Key.Original: Syrta, Sergeant. 3 klicks to the northeast.
Key.Chinesesimp: 西尔塔，中士。东北方3公里。

Container.name: x05_Mark_Start_Wrong_2
Container.situation: player takes too long or marks the wrong location again

Key.Original: Right there, Conway, for God's sake.

Container.name: x01_Mark_Start_Wrong_1
Container.situation: player takes too long or marks the wrong location

Container.name: d05_Returned
Container.situation: lacey regrouped with adams after finding the stash

Key.Original: I let Broadway know what's going on. We've been ordered back to base.
Key.Chinese: 我已經讓Broadway知道這裡的事情了。我們已經被下令返回基地了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我会让“百老汇”知道这里的事情。我们已经被下令返回基地了。

Key.Original: I've told these idiots to clean up the mess. They'll handle the weapons.
Key.Chinese: 我已經告訴這些白癡去處理這個爛攤子了。他們會處裡那些武器。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我已经告诉这些白痴去处理这个烂摊子了。他们会处理那些武器。

Key.Original: I can't help but think the guerrillas won't take too kindly to this.
Key.Chinese: 我認為游擊隊應該不會輕易就把這件事給算了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我认为游击队应该不会轻易就把这件事给算了。

Container.name: d01_Situation
Container.participants: BOOT B Lacey;BOOT B Adams;BOOT I Soldier A;
Container.situation: adams and lacey arrive at the scene of the crime

Key.Chinese: 這裡他媽的發生了什麼事?
Key.Chinesesimp: 这里他妈的发生了什么事?

Key.Original: And these people? They attacked you?
Key.Chinese: 那這些人呢?他們攻擊你?
Key.Chinesesimp: 那这些人呢?他们攻击你?

Key.Original: Did you sweep the buildings? And what's the deal with that man over there?
Key.Chinese: 你有沒有掃蕩過建築了?而且你有沒有去處理一下那邊那個人?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你有没有扫荡过建筑?而且你有没有去处理一下那边那个人?

Key.Original: We were on patrol. We were attacked.
Key.Chinese: 我們本來是在巡邏。但我們遭受到了攻擊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们本来是在巡逻。但我们遭受到了攻击。

Key.Original: You searched all of them? ... Including the ones down there?
Key.Chinese: 你真的搜索全部了?...包括那邊那棟?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你真的都搜了?...包括那边那栋?

Key.Original: You ever heard of excessive force?
Key.Chinese: 你有沒有聽過濫用暴力這個詞?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你有没有听过滥用暴力这个词?

Key.Original: And that man? Do you have medical support inbound?
Key.Chinese: 還有那個人?你有沒有請求醫療支援過來這邊?
Key.Chinesesimp: 还有那个人?你有没有请求过医疗支援?

Key.Chinese: 是的。難道我說的不夠清楚?
Key.Chinesesimp: 是的。难道我说的不够清楚?

Key.Original: Sergeant, search those buildings down there.
Key.Chinese: 中士，去搜索那邊那棟房屋。
Key.Chinesesimp: 中士，去搜索那边那栋房屋。

Key.Original: The rest of you, set up a perimeter.
And you, call for a goddamn medevac. Now.
Key.Chinese: 還有你，趕快去給我呼叫他媽的醫療後送。現在。
Key.Chinesesimp: 还有你，赶快去给我呼叫他妈的医疗后送。现在。

Key.Chinese: 有，我們看過了。他們是安全的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 有，我们看过了。他们是安全的。

Container.name: 95_Left_2
Container.situation: player comes upon the roadblock, goes around

Key.Original: Take the left, Conway. Around the town.
Key.Chinesesimp: 先左转吧，康维。绕过城镇。

Container.name: 90_GPS
Container.situation: adams tells the player to watch the gps

Key.Original: Keep an eye on the GPS, Sergeant.

Container.name: 85_Left_1
Container.situation: adams tells the player to turn left

Container.name: 80_Get_In
Container.situation: adams tells his team to board the truck

Key.Original: The rest of you? Load up!

Container.name: 75_Orders
Container.situation: adams tells the trainees what to do

Key.Original: Okay. We're going to go find your friends.
Key.Chinese: 好。我們現在要去找你們的朋友了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好。我们现在要去找你们的朋友了。

Key.Original: Keep yourselves busy while we're gone.
Key.Chinese: 在我們離開後千萬不要讓自己閒著。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在我们离开后千万不要让自己闲着。

Container.name: 70_En_Route
Container.participants: BOOT I Soldier A;BOOT B Adams;
Container.situation: adams tells the aaf they're en route

Key.Chinese: 我們找到你們的座標了。075-183。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们找到你们的座标了。075-183。

Key.Original: We're on our way. Stay put. Out.
Key.Chinese: 我們正在前往的路上。請稍等。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们正在前往的路上。请稍等。通话完毕。

Key.Chinese: 美國佬?你們的狀況如何?
Key.Chinesesimp: 美国佬?你们的状况如何?

Container.name: 65_Location_Marked
Container.situation: the player successfully marked the aaf's location

Container.name: 60_Mark_Location
Container.situation: adams tells the player to mark the aaf's location

Key.Original: You'll notice the lines intersect. That, in a nutshell, is all we're looking for.
Key.Chinese: 你們會發現到有線相交了。對，這就是我們一直在找的點。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你们会发现两条线相交了。对，这就是我们一直在找的点。

Key.Original: It tells us that - if the information provided is accurate - they must be somewhere near there.
Key.Chinese: 這說明了一件事-假如他們的情報沒有說錯的話-他們應該就在那裡附近。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这说明了一件事-假如他们的情报没有说错的话-他们应该就在那里附近。

Key.Original: However, the intersect won't always be exact. Use common sense to enhance your accuracy, or try to obtain further information.
Key.Chinese: 然而，情報不是總是正確的。使用你的常識來提高準確度，或者跟他們要求更多的情報。
Key.Chinesesimp: 然而，情报不是总是正确的。使用你的知识来提高准确度，或者跟他们要求更多的情报。

Key.Original: Over to you, Sergeant. Stick a marker on their position.
Key.Chinese: 看你的了，中士。放一個標記到他們的位置。
Key.Chinesesimp: 看你的了，中士。放一个标记到他们的位置。

Container.name: 55_Hill_Marked
Container.situation: the player successfully marked the hill

Key.Original: Alright. The bearing they gave us was 130.
Key.Chinese: 好的。他們給我們的方位是130。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的。他们给我们的方位是130。

Key.Original: However, that's from them to the chapel. We want to work out the bearing from the chapel to their position.
Key.Chinese: 然而，那是從他們的視角看才準。我們要從禮拜堂的位置推算回他們的位置。
Key.Chinesesimp: 然而，那是从他们的视角看才准。我们要从礼拜堂的位置推算回他们的位置。

Key.Original: So, let's do a 180... That makes it 310 from the chapel itself.
Key.Chinese: 所以，讓我們轉個180度...他們是在禮拜堂方位310左右的位置。
Key.Chinesesimp: 所以，让我们转个180度...他们是在礼拜堂方位310左右的位置。

Container.name: 50_Mark_Hill
Container.situation: adams tells the player to mark the hill

Key.Original: That's probably somewhere southwest of Syrta itself.
Key.Chinese: 那應該是在Syrta的西南方左有。
Key.Chinesesimp: 那应该是在西尔塔西南的什么位置。

Key.Original: Think you can locate it, Sergeant?

Container.name: 49_More_Info
Container.participants: BOOT B Adams;BOOT I Soldier A;
Container.situation: the aaf provide the next bit of info

Key.Original: Can you guys give us any other landmarks to go on?
Key.Chinese: 你們還能給點其他的地標資訊嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 你们还能给点其他的地标信息吗?

Key.Original: There´s a hill nearby. It has a small chapel on top of it. It´s at bearing... 130, from our position. Over.
Key.Chinese: 我們附近有一座小山。它山頂有個小禮拜堂。它的方位是...130，從我們這邊位置看的話。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们附近有一座小山。它山顶有个小礼拜堂。它的方位是...130，从我们这边位置看的话。完毕。

Container.name: 45_Town_Marked
Container.situation: the player marked the town correctly

Key.Original: Now, let's draw a line going west from Syrta.
Key.Chinese: 現在，讓我們在Syrta的西方畫一條線。
Key.Chinesesimp: 现在，让我们从西尔塔向西画一条线。

Container.name: 40_Mark_Town
Container.participants: BOOT B Adams;BOOT I Soldier B;
Container.situation: adams tells the player to mark the town

Key.Original: Alright, Sergeant, stick a marker on Syrta. It should be about 3 klicks to the northeast.
Key.Chinese: 好的，中士，請標記一個點在Syrta上。它應該在我們東北方3千米左右。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，中士，请在西尔塔上标一个点。它应该在我们东北方3千米左右。

Container.name: 35_Info
Container.participants: BOOT B Adams;BOOT I Soldier A;
Container.situation: the aaf provide more info on their location

Key.Original: We need some landmarks to go off, here. Do you have anything we can use? Did you spot anything recognizable en route to your location? Over.
Key.Chinese: 我們這裡需要一點地標才能開使定位。你有任何我們需要的資訊嗎?你們在來到現在位置的途中有識別到任何位置嗎?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们这里需要一点地标才能开始定位。你有任何我们需要的信息吗?你们在来到现在位置的途中有识别到任何位置吗?完毕。

Key.Original: Well... We know that we are west of Syrta. We drove through it.
Key.Chinese: 這個嗎...我們知道我們是在Syrta的西方。我們剛剛有經過它。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好吧...我们知道我们是在西尔塔的西方。我们刚刚有经过它。

Container.name: 30_Triangulate
Container.situation: adams explains that they're going to triangulate the aaf's position

Key.Original: We're going to try and triangulate their position. However, before we get on to that...
Key.Chinese: 現在讓我們來試試用三角定位來找出他們的位置。然而，在我們開始之前...
Key.Chinesesimp: 现在让我们来试试用三角定位来找出他们的位置。然而，在我们开始之前...

Container.name: 25_Grids
Container.situation: adams tells the player to place a marker on their position

Key.Original: Before we begin, Sergeant - if you'd be so kind - stick a marker on our location. 066-159.
Key.Chinese: 在我們開始前，中士-假如你是個好人的話-請幫我們標記我們所在的點。066-159。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在我们开始前，中士-假如你是个好人的话-请帮我们标记我们所在的点。066-159。

Key.Original: For those just tuning in, six-figure grids are a crucial navigational tool.
Key.Chinese: 為了這些小毛頭，就讓我來說明一下，六位數的網格座標是我們重要的導航工具。
Key.Chinesesimp: 为了这些小毛头，就让我来说明一下，六位数的网格座标是我们重要的导航工具。

Key.Original: Coordinates are read from the bottom first, followed by the ones that run up the side.
Key.Chinese: 座標必須先從底部的數字讀起，在念旁邊的數字。
Key.Chinesesimp: 座标必须先从底部的数字读起，再念旁边的数字。

Container.name: 20_Lesson
Container.situation: adams tells the trainees what they're going to do

Key.Original: Since your people are completely incapable of intelligent thought, it has fallen upon us to rescue them from certain doom.
Key.Chinese: 既然你們的人不能自己用大腦去解決問題的話，這救援的任務就只好由我們來執行了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 既然你们的人不能自己用大脑去解决问题的话，这救援的任务就只好由我们来执行了。

Container.name: 15_Map
Container.situation: adams tells the player to open his map

Container.name: 150_RTB
Container.situation: adams tells his team to leave

Key.Original: Alright, everyone. Mount up. We're out of here.
Key.Chinese: 好的，所有人。上機吧。這裡沒我們的事了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，都有，上车。这里没我们的事了。

Container.name: 145_Stash_Found
Container.participants: BOOT B Lacey;BOOT I Soldier A;BOOT B Adams;
Container.situation: player found the weapon stash

Key.Original: You see? They were a threat.
Adams, I've got a weapon stash here. Small arms and explosives. Definitely guerrilla. Over.
Key.Chinese: Adams，我這裡找到了一個武器箱。小型武器與一些炸藥。絕對是屬於游擊隊的。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 亚当斯，我这里找到了一个武器库。轻武器和炸药。绝对是游击队。完毕。

Key.Original: Yeah, and I'm sure they just attacked you for no reason.
Key.Chinese: 是阿，而且我敢確定他們是沒有理由就攻擊你們的對吧。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是啊，而且我敢确定他们是没有理由就攻击你们的对吧。

Container.name: 140_Clear_3
Container.situation: player clears the third house

Container.name: 135_Clear_2
Container.situation: player clears the second house

Key.Original: Small one's clear. Continuing the search.
Key.Chinese: 小間的也安全。繼續搜索中。
Key.Chinesesimp: 小间的也安全。继续搜索中。

Container.name: 130_Clear_1
Container.situation: player clears the first house

Key.Chinese: 第二個倉庫安全。繼續下間中。
Key.Chinesesimp: 第二个仓库安全。继续下间中。

Container.name: 125_Disembark
Container.situation: adams tells his team to disembark

Container.name: 120_Arrived
Container.situation: the player drove the truck to the aaf

Container.name: 115_Right_1
Container.situation: adams tells the player to turn right

Container.name: 110_SITREP
Container.participants: BOOT B Adams;BOOT B HQ;BOOT I HQ;BOOT B Soldier A;
Container.situation: adams asks hq about the earthquake

Key.Original: Keep driving. I'll check with MacKinnon.
Key.Chinese: 繼續開。讓我來跟MacKinnon確認一下。
Key.Chinesesimp: 继续开。让我来跟麦金农确认一下。

Key.Original: Broadway, Alpha 1-1 Actual. Was that what I think it was? Over.
Key.Chinese: Broadway，這裡是Alpha1-1隊長。地震應該沒啥事吧?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: “百老汇”，这里是“阿尔法”1-1领队。这会是我想的那样吗?完毕。

Key.Original: Yeah, we got it, Colonel. 1-1 out.
Key.Chinese: 恩，我們了解了，上校。1-1通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗯，我们了解了，上校。1-1通话完毕。

Key.Original: Confirmed, 1-1. Just a small tremor. No cause for concern. Over.
Key.Chinese: 確認，1-1。只是個小地震。沒有令人擔心的地方。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 确认，1-1。只是起小地震。不要担心。完毕。

Key.Original: Phalanx to all units, we just experienced a light earthquake. Do not be alarmed. Return to your posts and resume your duties. Out.
Key.Chinese: Phalanx致所有單位，我們剛經歷了一場小地震。不要驚慌。請返回繼續做自己的任務。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: “密集阵”致所有单位，我们刚经历了一场小地震。不要惊慌。返回岗位继续执行任务。通话完毕。

Key.Original: Guess some Greenbacks must have shit themselves.
Key.Chinese: 我猜有些綠軍一定被嚇的驚慌失措。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我猜有些绿军一定被吓尿裤子了。

Container.name: 10_Gather
Container.situation: adams makes aaf gather around

Key.Original: Come on, don't be shy now - we're going to learn something useful.
Key.Chinese: 來，別害羞-我們來學點有用的東西。
Key.Chinesesimp: 来，别害羞-我们来学点有用的东西。

Container.name: 105_Earthquake
Container.situation: earthquake triggered

Key.Original: For the record, I'm blaming CSAT.
Key.Chinese: 幫我記一下，這筆帳算在CSAT的頭上。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我把话讲清，我觉得肯定是广协同盟干的。

Container.name: 100_Left_3
Container.situation: adams tells the player to turn left

Container.name: 05_Idiots
Container.situation: adams comments on the aaf

Key.Original: It's always something with these people...
Key.Chinese: 他們總是能幹出這種傻事...

Container.name: 01_Start
Container.participants: BOOT B Adams;BOOT I Soldier A;
Container.situation: adams asks the aaf for more info

Key.Original: What do you mean 'incident'? Send us your grid. Over.
Key.Chinese: 你的'意外'是什麼意思?請給我你們的座標。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你说的“事件”是什么意思?请给我你们的座标。完毕。

Key.Chinese: 請重發?為什麼不行?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 再说一遍?为什么不行?完毕。

Key.Original: We do not have a map.

Container.name: 50_Location_Marked
Container.situation: lacey locates the aaf

Key.Original: Yup, that looks like it's them.
Key.Chinese: 恩，看來這就是他們的位置了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 嗯，看来这就是他们的位置了。

Container.name: 45_Hill_Marked
Container.situation: adams tells him to locate the aaf

Key.Original: Okay, look where the lines intersect. They should be some place near there. Think you can figure out where?
Key.Chinese: 好，現在讓我們看看線在哪裡相交。他們應該就在那附近左右。你能找到他們嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 好，现在让我们看看线在哪里相交。他们应该就在那附近左右。你能找到他们吗?

Container.name: 40_Mark_Hill
Container.situation: adams tells lacey to mark the hill

Key.Original: Sounds like that's probably southwest from Syrta. Think you can locate?
Key.Chinese: 聽起來那山應該在Syrta西南方。你有找到嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 听起来那山应该在西尔塔西南方。你有找到吗?

Container.name: 35_Radio
Container.participants: BOOT B Adams;BOOT I Soldier A;
Container.situation: adams asks for more info from the aaf

Key.Original: Can you identify any other landmarks? A hill, a road, anything? Over.
Key.Chinese: 你們可以辨識附近任何的地標嗎?山頭，道路，任何東西?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你们可以辨识附近任何的地标吗?山头，道路，任何东西?完毕。

Key.Original: Okay, that should help. Hold on.
Key.Chinese: 好的，這應該就夠了。請稍等。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，这应该就够了。请稍等。

Key.Original: We have a hill southeast of us, bearing... 130. It has a small chapel on it. Over.
Key.Chinese: 我們東南方的方向有一座小山，方位是...130。它的上面有一間小禮拜堂。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们东南方的方向有一座小山，方位是...130。它的上面有一间小礼拜堂。完毕。

Container.name: 30_More_Info
Container.situation: adams fails to locate the aaf

Key.Original: Well that's not overly helpful. Hold on.
Key.Chinese: 看來我們的情報還不夠多。稍等下。
Key.Chinesesimp: 看来我们的情报还不够多。稍等下。

Container.name: 25_Town_Marked
Container.situation: adams attempts to locate the aaf

Key.Original: They said they're to the west, so let's see where that takes us...
Key.Chinese: 他們說他們在西面那側，讓我們看看這會是哪裡...
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们说他们在西面那侧，让我们看看这会是哪里...

Container.name: 20_Mark_Town
Container.situation: adams tells him to mark syrta

Key.Original: Now stick one on Syrta. It should be about 3 klicks northeast of us.
Key.Chinese: 現在標記一個點在Syrta上。它大概距離我們東北方3公里左右。
Key.Chinesesimp: 现在标记一个点在Syrta上。它大概距离我们东北方3公里左右。

Container.name: 15_Mark_Start
Container.situation: adams tells him to mark their location

Key.Original: Alright, stick a marker on our position. Grid 066 160.
Key.Chinese: 好，現在我們先定位出我們自己的位置。座標066160。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好，现在我们先定位出我们自己的位置。座标066160。

Container.name: 10_Map
Container.situation: adams tells lacey to bring up his map

Key.Original: Try every weapon, item and vehicle Arma 3 has to offer.
Key.Chinese: 試用ArmA3提供的各式裝備，武器及載具。
Key.Chinesesimp: 试用武装突袭3提供的各式装备，武器及载具。

Key.Original: Walk to an orb or shoot it to select your course.
Key.Chinese: 走到箭頭下方或射擊它，即可選擇該課程。
Key.Chinesesimp: 走到箭头下方或射击它，即可选择该课程。

Key.Chinese: 連線中斷，關閉虛擬實境程式中...
Key.Chinesesimp: 连接中断，关闭虚拟实境程序中...

Key.Original: Use the 'ACTION' section of the Command menu and order your AI medic to treat the wounded soldier.
Key.Chinese: 使用命令選單的動作命令，命令AI醫護兵去醫療傷員。
Key.Chinesesimp: 使用命令菜单的操作命令，命令AI医护兵去医疗伤员。

Key.Original: Use the 'ACTION' section of the Command menu and order your AI engineer to repair the damaged vehicle.
Key.Chinese: 使用命令選單的動作命令，命令AI工兵去維修載具。
Key.Chinesesimp: 使用命令菜单的操作命令，命令AI工兵去维修载具。

Key.Original: Use the 'ACTION' section of the Command menu and order your AI engineer to deactivate the mine.
Key.Chinese: 使用命令選單的動作命令，命令AI工兵去拆除地雷。
Key.Chinesesimp: 使用命令菜单的操作命令，命令AI工兵去拆除地雷。

Key.Original: Use the 'COMBAT MODE' section of the Command menu and order your AI subordinate to 'stay crouched'.
Key.Chinese: 使用命令選單的姿態命令，命令AI蹲下。
Key.Chinesesimp: 使用命令菜单的姿态命令，命令AI蹲下。

Key.Original: Use the 'COMBAT MODE' section of the Command menu and order your AI subordinate to 'go prone'.
Key.Chinese: 使用命令選單的姿態命令，命令AI趴下。
Key.Chinesesimp: 使用命令菜单的姿态命令，命令AI趴下。

Key.Original: Use the 'COMBAT MODE' section of the Command menu and order your AI subordinate to 'stand up'.
Key.Chinese: 使用命令選單的姿態命令，命令AI站起。
Key.Chinesesimp: 使用命令菜单的姿态命令，命令AI站起。

Key.Original: Use the 'ENGAGE' section of the Command menu and order your AI subordinate watch the west direction.
Key.Chinese: 使用命令選單的交戰命令，命令AI觀察西方。
Key.Chinesesimp: 使用命令菜单的交战命令，命令AI观察西方。

Key.Original: Use the 'ENGAGE' section of the Command menu and order your AI subordinate watch the east direction.
Key.Chinese: 使用命令選單的交戰命令，命令AI觀察東方。
Key.Chinesesimp: 使用命令菜单的交战命令，命令AI观察东方。

Key.Original: Use the 'COMBAT MODE' section of the Command menu and change your group's behavior to 'COMBAT'.
Key.Chinese: 使用命令選單的交戰模式，命令AI進入交戰狀態。
Key.Chinesesimp: 使用命令菜单的交战模式，命令AI进入交战状态。

Key.Original: Move slowly to the marked location and watch your subordinate's behavior.
Key.Chinese: 緩慢移動到標記點，並觀察你部下的行為。
Key.Chinesesimp: 缓慢移动到标记点，并观察你部下的行为。

Key.Original: Use the 'COMBAT MODE' section of the Command menu and change your group's behavior to 'STEALTH'.
Key.Chinese: 使用命令選單的交戰模式，命令AI進入隱藏狀態。
Key.Chinesesimp: 使用命令菜单的交战模式，命令AI进入隐藏状态。

Key.Original: Move slowly to the marked location and watch your subordinate's behavior.
Key.Chinese: 緩慢移動到標記點，並觀察你部下的行為。
Key.Chinesesimp: 缓慢移动到标记点，并观察你部下的行为。

Key.Original: Use the Map and Context menu to send your subordinate to the marked location.
Key.Chinese: 運用地圖來為你的部下標記路徑點，讓他們移動到標記點。
Key.Chinesesimp: 运用地图来为你的部下标记路径点，让他们移动到标记点。

Key.Original:
Move to the marked location.

Your subordinates will be following you automatically.
Key.Chinese:
移動到標記點。

你的部下會自動跟隨你。
Key.Chinesesimp:
移动到标记点。

你的部下会自动跟随你。

Key.Original: Use the 'MOVE' section of the Command menu and order your AI subordinate to get back into the formation.
Key.Chinese: 使用命令選單的移動命令，命令AI返回編隊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 使用命令菜单的移动命令，命令AI返回编队。

Key.Original: Use the 'FORMATION' section of the Command menu and change your group's formation to 'LINE'.
Key.Chinese: 使用命令選單的隊形命令，命令AI進入一字隊形。
Key.Chinesesimp: 使用命令菜单的队形命令，命令AI进入一字队形。

Key.Original: Move to the marked location in the 'LINE' formation.
Key.Chinese: 使用一字隊形移動到標記點。
Key.Chinesesimp: 使用一字队形移动到标记点。

Key.Original: Use the 'FORMATION' section of the Command menu and change your group's formation to 'COLUMN'.
Key.Chinese: 使用命令選單的隊形命令，命令AI進入單縱隊形。
Key.Chinesesimp: 使用命令菜单的队形命令，命令AI进入单纵队形。

Key.Original: Move to the marked location in the 'COLUMN' formation.
Key.Chinese: 使用單縱隊形移動到標記點。
Key.Chinesesimp: 使用单纵队形移动到标记点。

Key.Original: Use the 'MOUNT' section of the Command menu and order your AI subordinate to get in the designated vehicle as a driver.
Key.Chinese: 使用命令選單的動作命令，命令AI進入載具擔當駕駛。
Key.Chinesesimp: 使用命令菜单的操作命令，命令AI进入载具担任驾驶。

Key.Original: Use the 'MOUNT' section of the Command menu and order your AI subordinate to get in the designated vehicle as a gunner.
Key.Chinese: 使用命令選單的動作命令，命令AI進入載具擔當炮手。
Key.Chinesesimp: 使用命令菜单的操作命令，命令AI进入载具担任炮手。

Key.Original: Use the 'MOUNT' section of the Command menu and order your AI subordinate to disembark from the current vehicle.
Key.Chinese: 使用命令選單的動作命令，命令AI離開當前載具。
Key.Chinesesimp: 使用命令菜单的操作命令，命令AI离开当前载具。

Key.Original: Use the 'MOUNT' section of the Command menu and order your AI subordinate to get in the designated vehicle as a driver.
Key.Chinese: 使用命令選單的動作命令，命令AI進入載具擔當駕駛。
Key.Chinesesimp: 使用命令菜单的操作命令，命令AI进入载具担任驾驶。

Key.Original: Use the Map and Context menu to send your AI subordinate to the marked location.
Key.Chinese: 使用地圖命令AI前往標記點。
Key.Chinesesimp: 使用地图命令AI前往标记点。

Key.Original: Use the 'MOUNT' section of the Command menu and order your AI subordinate to get in the designated vehicle as a gunner.
Key.Chinese: 使用命令選單的動作命令，命令AI進入載具擔當炮手。
Key.Chinesesimp: 使用命令菜单的操作命令，命令AI进入载具担任炮手。

Key.Original: Use the 'ENGAGE' section of the Command menu and order your AI subordinate to 'Open fire' and eliminate all nearby enemies.
Key.Chinese: 使用命令選單的交戰命令，命令AI開始主動開火。
Key.Chinesesimp: 使用命令菜单的交战命令，命令AI开始主动开火。

Key.Original: Move to the mark to finish this Stage. Observe the bullet trajectories.
Key.Chinese: 靠近標記來完成這個課程。順便觀察一下子彈的軌跡。
Key.Chinesesimp: 靠近标记来完成这个课程。顺便观察一下子弹的轨迹。

Key.Original: Take down your target behind the obstacle. Observe the ballistics and penetration. Your movement is disabled for now.
Key.Chinese: 擊倒藏在障礙後的目標。順便觀察一下子彈的軌跡。你在此課程暫時還不能移動。
Key.Chinesesimp: 击倒藏在障碍后的目标。顺便观察一下子弹的轨迹。你在此课程暂时还不能移动。

Key.Original: Take down your target. Observe the ballistics and penetration.
Key.Chinese: 擊倒你的目標。順便觀察一下子彈的軌跡。
Key.Chinesesimp: 击倒你的目标。顺便观察一下子弹的轨迹。

Key.Original: Shoot down the helicopter with your rocket launcher.
Key.Chinese: 用你的發射器擊落直升機。
Key.Chinesesimp: 用你的导弹发射器击落直升机。

Key.Original: Destroy the tank with your rocket launcher.
Key.Chinese: 用你的發射器摧毀坦克。
Key.Chinesesimp: 用你的发射器摧毁坦克。

Key.Original: Take the launcher and some rockets from the nearby crate.
Key.Chinese: 從彈藥箱中拿取發射器與其彈藥。
Key.Chinesesimp: 从弹药箱中拿取发射器与其弹药。

Key.Original: Take the mine so you can place it at a different position.
Key.Chinese: 拿取地雷好讓你放置在別的地方。
Key.Chinesesimp: 拿取地雷以便让你放置在别的地方。

Key.Original: Deactivate the mine placed at the designated location.
Wait until the mine is triggered.
Get to the overwatch position in the watchtower.
Place your mine on the designated location. You can find additional charges in the crate at your starting location.
Key.Chinese: 放置你的地雷在指定的位置。如果你沒有地雷，你可以在出發點附近的彈藥箱中拿取。
Key.Chinesesimp: 放置你的地雷在指定的位置。如果你没有地雷，你可以在出发点附近的弹药箱中拿取。

Key.Original: Do not kill any friendly (blue) units.
Key.Chinese: 不要殺死友軍(藍色)單位。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不要杀死友军(蓝色)单位。

Key.Original: Eliminate the enemy (orange) squad with a single directional claymore. The arc in front of you represents the kill radius of the claymore. You can find additional charges in the crate at your starting location.
Key.Chinese: 殲滅所有敵人(橘色)，你必須使用一顆指向性炸藥來達成這個任務。你面前的扇形圖示代表著炸藥的殺傷範圍。如果你沒有地雷，你可以在出發點附近的彈藥箱中拿取。
Key.Chinesesimp: 歼灭所有敌人(橘色)，你必须使用一颗定向炸药来达成这个任务。你面前的扇形图示代表着炸药的杀伤范围。如果你没有地雷，你可以在出发点附近的弹药箱中拿取。

Key.Chinese: 反坦克地雷與拆除作業
Key.Chinesesimp: 反坦克地雷与拆除作业

Key.Original: The arc in front of you represents the kill radius of the claymore.
Key.Chinese: 你面前的扇形圖示代表著炸藥的殺傷範圍。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你面前的扇形图示代表着炸药的杀伤范围。

Key.Original: Assemble the UAV you're carrying in your backpack.
Key.Chinese: 組裝你背包中的無人載具。
Key.Chinesesimp: 组装你背包中的无人机。

Key.Original: Use the UAV's designator to mark the nearby tank.
Key.Chinese: 使用無人載具上的雷射指示器標定坦克。
Key.Chinesesimp: 使用无人机上的激光指示器标记坦克。

Key.Original: Connect your terminal to the UAV.
Key.Chinese: 使你的終端機與無人載具連線。
Key.Chinesesimp: 使你的终端机与无人载具连接。

Key.Original: Use your designator to mark the nearby tank.
Key.Chinese: 使用無人載具上的雷射指示器標定坦克。
Key.Chinesesimp: 使用无人载具上的激光指示器标记坦克。

Key.Original: Keep the laser on the target until it's destroyed.
Key.Chinese: 保持你的雷射在目標上，直到目標被摧毀。
Key.Chinesesimp: 保持你的激光在目标上，直到目标被摧毁。

Key.Original: Move away from the blast radius!
For further info, consult the field manual.
Key.Chinese: 要查詢更多訊息，請查看野戰手冊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 要查询更多信息，请查看野战手册。

Key.Original: For further info, consult the %1field manual%2.
Key.Chinese: 欲知更多詳情，請查閱%1野戰手冊%2。
Key.Chinesesimp: 欲知更多详情，请查阅%1野战手册%2。

Key.Chinese: 要解鎖此課程，你必須先完成:
Key.Chinesesimp: 要解锁此课程，你必须先完成:

Key.Original: For an optimal Bootcamp experience, it is recommended to use the Regular Difficulty preset. Switch now?
Key.Chinese: 為了獲得最好的新兵訓練效果，建議你使用普通難度來遊玩。要切換難度嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 为了获得最好的新兵训练效果，建议你使用普通难度来游玩。要切换难度吗?

Key.Original: One year before the events of 'The East Wind', NATO peacekeepers and government forces conduct joint training exercises in The Republic of Altis and Stratis.
Key.Chinese: 在'東風'事件發生的前一年，NATO維和部隊與政府軍正在Altis和Stratis共和國上進行聯合訓練。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在'东风'事件发生的前一年，北约维和部队与政府军正在阿尔蒂斯和斯特拉蒂斯共和国内进行联合训练。

Key.Original: For an optimal Bootcamp experience, it is recommended that you switch to the Regular Difficulty preset.
Key.Chinese: 為了獲得最好的新兵訓練效果，建議你使用普通難度來遊玩。
Key.Chinesesimp: 为了获得最好的新兵训练效果，建议你使用普通难度来游玩。

Key.Chinese: 宙斯16+2主宰虛擬實境(廣協同盟)
Key.Chinesesimp: 宙斯16+2主宰虚拟实境(广协同盟)

Key.Chinese: 宙斯16+2主宰虛擬實境(Altis政府軍)
Key.Chinesesimp: 宙斯16+2主宰虚拟实境(阿尔蒂斯政府军)

Key.Chinese: 宙斯16+2主宰虛擬實境(北約)
Key.Chinesesimp: 宙斯16+2主宰虚拟实境(北约)
阿尔蒂斯武装力量士兵
阿尔蒂斯武装力量军官
